  6764                                  
  6765                                  ; for bigfat we do need to extend this logic to 32 bit sector calculation.
  6766                                  
  6767                                  dobig:					
  6768 00001FF4 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  6769 00001FF6 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)
  6770 00001FF7 8B550C                  		mov	dx, [di+0Ch]	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6771 00001FFA D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl		; root dir sectors = BDS.direntries / 16;
  6772 00001FFC 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
  6773 00001FFE 5A                      		pop	dx
  6774 00001FFF 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= total	sectors	- root dir sectors
  6775 00002002 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6776 00002005 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= t - r	- d
  6777                                  					; total	secs - reserved	secs - root dir	secs
  6778 00002008 B302                    		mov	bl, 2
  6779 0000200A 8A7D08                  		mov	bh, [di+8]	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  6780                                  					; bx = 256 * BDS.secperclus + 2
  6781                                  
  6782                                  ; I don't understand why to add bx here!!!
  6783                                  
  6784                                  		; 29/12/2018 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.0)
  6785                                  		; 27/09/2022
  6786                                  		; (Microsoft FAT32 File	System Specification,
  6787                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)
  6788                                  		; TmpVal1 = DskSize - (BPB_ResvdSecCnt+RootrDirSectors)
  6789                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  6790                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6791                                  		; (If FATType == FAT16,	BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz))
  6792                                  		
  6793 0000200D 01D8                    		add	ax, bx		; ax = t-r-d+256*spc+2
  6794 0000200F 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  6795 00002012 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1		; ax = t-r-d+256*spc+1
  6796 00002015 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0
  6797                                  
  6798                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  6799                                  
  6800 00002018 F7F3                    		div	bx		; BDS.fatsecs =
  6801                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))
  6802 0000201A 894511                  		mov	[di+11h], ax	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6803                                  					; number of fat	sectors
  6804                                  
  6805                                  ; now, set the default filesys_id, volume label, serial number
  6806                                  
  6807                                  		;;mov	bl, ds:fbigfat
  6808                                  		; 11/09/2023
  6809                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6810                                  		;mov	bl, [fbigfat]
  6811                                  		;mov	[di+1Fh], bl	; [di+BDS.fatsiz] ; fat	size flag
  6812                                  
  6813 0000201D 1E                      		push	ds
  6814 0000201E 1E                      		push	ds
  6815 0000201F 07                      		pop	es
  6816 00002020 0E                      		push	cs
  6817 00002021 1F                      		pop	ds
  6818                                  		; 11/09/2023
  6819 00002022 A0[D216]                		mov	al, [fbigfat]
  6820 00002025 BD[D005]                		mov	bp, CLEARIDS_X	; clear_ids_x (uses AL value here)
  6821                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6822                                  		;mov	bp, CLEARIDS
  6823                                  		;;mov	bp, 5D9h	; clear_ids
  6824                                  					; at 2C7h:5D9h = 70h:2B49h
  6825 00002028 0E                      		push	cs

  6827 0000202C 1F                      		pop	ds
  6828                                  
  6829                                  ; at this point, in bpb of bds table, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS which is
  6830                                  ; set according to the partition information. we are going to
  6831                                  ; see if (hidden sectors + total sectors) > a word. if it is true,
  6832                                  ; then no change. otherwise, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be moved
  6833                                  ; to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be set to 0.
  6834                                  ; we don't do this for the bpb information from the boot record. we
  6835                                  ; are not going to change the bpb information from the boot record.
  6836                                  
  6837                                  massage_bpb:
  6838                                  		; 11/09/2023
  6839                                  		;; 12/12/2022
  6840                                  		;mov	bl, [fbigfat]
  6841                                  		;mov	[di+1Fh], bl	; [di+BDS.fatsiz]
  6842                                  		;;			; set size of fat on media
  6843                                  		
  6844 0000202D 8B551D                  		mov	dx, [di+1Dh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6845 00002030 8B451B                  		mov	ax, [di+1Bh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6846 00002033 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0		; double word total sectors?
  6847                                  		;ja	short goodret	; don't have to change it.
  6848                                  		; 12/12/2022
  6849 00002036 771B                    		ja	short short goodret2
  6850                                  		;cmp	word [di+19h], 0 ; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  6851                                  		;ja	short goodret	; don't have to change it.
  6852                                  		; 12/12/2022

  6857                                  		; 12/12/2022

  6861                                  		;mov	word [di+1Bh], 0 ; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]

  6874                                  		; 12/12/2022

  6883                                  
  6884                                  ; 15/10/2022
  6885                                  
  6886                                  ;fdisk of pc dos 3.3 and below, os2 1.0 has a bug. the maximum number of
  6887                                  ;sector that can be handled by pc dos 3.3 ibmbio should be 0ffffh.
  6888                                  ;instead, sometimes fdisk use 10000h to calculate the maximum number.
  6889                                  ;so, we are going to check that if BPB_TOTALSECTORS + hidden sector = 10000h
  6890                                  ;then subtract 1 from BPB_TOTALSECTORS.
  6891                                  
  6892                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6893                                  cover_fdisk_bug:	
  6894 00002058 50                      		push	ax
  6895 00002059 52                      		push	dx
  6896 0000205A 56                      		push	si
  6897 0000205B 2E803E[7401]29          		cmp	byte [cs:disksector+26h], 29h
  6898                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
  6899                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
  6900 00002061 7431                    		jz	short cfb_retit	; if extended bpb, then	>= pc dos 4.00
  6901 00002063 2E817F073130            		cmp	word [cs:bx+7], 3031h ; '10' ; os2 1.0 = ibm 10.0
  6902 00002069 7507                    		jnz	short cfb_chk_BPB_TOTALSECTORS
  6903 0000206B 2E807F0A30              		cmp	byte [cs:bx+10], '0'
  6904 00002070 7522                    		jnz	short cfb_retit
  6905                                  cfb_chk_BPB_TOTALSECTORS:
  6906                                  		; 17/10/2022		
  6907 00002072 BE[5901]                		mov	si, disksector+11 ; 14Eh+0Bh
  6908                                  		;mov	si, 159h	; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB
  6909 00002075 2E837C0800              		cmp	word [cs:si+8], 0 ; [cs:si+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
  6910                                  					; just to make sure.

  6913 00002080 2E034411                		add	ax, [cs:si+11h]	; [cs:si+EBPB.HIDDENSECTORS]
  6914 00002084 730E                    		jnb	short cfb_retit
  6915 00002086 750C                    		jnz	short cfb_retit	; if carry set and ax=0
  6916 00002088 2EFF4C08                		dec	word [cs:si+8]	; 0 -> 0FFFFh

  6918 0000208C 836D1B01                		sub	word [di+1Bh], 1 ; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]

  6936                                  ; setdrvparms sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the system based on
  6937                                  ; the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the various form factors
  6938                                  ; are present in the bpbtable. for hard files, the recommended bpb is the same
  6939                                  ; as the bpb on the drive.

  6959 000020BD 268B451B                		mov	ax, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]

  6966                                  					; assume sectors per cyl. < 64k.

  6975 000020DA 58                      		pop	ax

  6986                                  					; ds:si	-> bpb for hard	file

  7066                                  							; correct offset

  7128                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7129                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7130                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7131                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7132                                  
  7133                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7134                                  ;
  7135                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7136                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7137                                  ;
  7138                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7139                                  ;
  7140                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7141                                  ;   initialize it.
  7142                                  ;
  7143                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7144                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7145                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7146                                  ;
  7147                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7148                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7149                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7150                                  ;
  7151                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7152                                  ;   save coding.
  7153                                  ;
  7154                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7155                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7156                                  ;
  7157                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7158                                  ;
  7159                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7160                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7161                                  ;
  7162                                  ; called modules:
  7163                                  ;		  getboot
  7164                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7165                                  ;
  7166                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7167                                  ;
  7168                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7169                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7170                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7171                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7172                                  ;
  7173                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7174                                  
  7175                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7176                                  domini:	
  7177 00002168 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7178                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7179 0000216C 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7180                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7181 0000216E 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7182 00002170 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7183                                  domini_loop:				
  7184 00002172 52                      		push	dx
  7185 00002173 8816[5017]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7186 00002177 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7187 00002179 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7188                                  					; DL = drive number
  7189                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7190                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7191                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7192 0000217B FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7193 0000217D 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7194 0000217F 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7195 00002181 A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7196 00002184 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7197 00002187 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7198 00002189 A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7199 0000218C 06                      		push	es
  7200 0000218D 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7201 00002191 E836FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7202                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7203 00002194 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7204 00002196 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7205                                  domininext:				
  7206 00002199 07                      		pop	es
  7207 0000219A 5A                      		pop	dx
  7208 0000219B FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7209 0000219D FECE                    		dec	dh
  7210 0000219F 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7211                                  dominiret:				
  7212 000021A1 C3                      		retn
  7213                                  
  7214                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7215                                  
  7216                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7217                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7218                                  
  7219                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7220                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7221                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7222                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7223                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7224                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7225                                  ;
  7226                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7227                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7228                                  
  7229                                  
  7230                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7231 000021A2 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7232                                  fmpnext:				
  7233 000021A6 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7234 000021AA 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7235 000021AC 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7236 000021AF 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7237 000021B3 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7238                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7239                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7240                                  fmpnextfound:
  7241 000021B5 C3                      		retn
  7242                                  
  7243                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7244                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7245                                  ;fmpret:
  7246                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7247                                  
  7248                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7249                                  
  7250                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7251                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7252 000021B6 E8A100                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7253 000021B9 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7254 000021BB 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7255 000021BF C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7256                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7257 000021C4 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7258                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7259                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7260 000021C8 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7261                                  					; ffHardFile
  7262 000021CC C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7263 000021D1 A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7264 000021D4 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7265 000021D7 A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7266 000021DA 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7267 000021DD A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7268 000021E0 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7269                                  					; set physical number
  7270 000021E3 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7271 000021E6 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7272                                  					; set logical number
  7273 000021E9 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7274 000021EE 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7275 000021F0 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7276                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7277 000021F5 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7278                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7279                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7280 000021F7 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7281 000021FA 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7282 000021FE 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7283 00002201 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7284 00002203 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7285 00002205 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7286 00002209 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7287                                  					; set hidden trks
  7288 0000220C 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7289 00002210 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7290 00002214 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7291 00002218 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7292 0000221B B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7293 0000221E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7294                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7295                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7296                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7297 00002220 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7298 00002222 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7299 00002225 06                      		push	es
  7300 00002226 E80900                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7301                                  					; bx value saved.
  7302 00002229 07                      		pop	es
  7303 0000222A 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7304 0000222C E84000                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7305                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7306 0000222F E974FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7307                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7308                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  7319                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7320

  7322 00002233 53                      		push	bx
  7323 00002234 1E                      		push	ds
  7324 00002235 06                      		push	es
  7325                                  setmini_1:

  7327 0000223A 741B                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7328 0000223C 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7329 00002240 7415                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7330 00002242 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG	partition
  7331 00002246 740F                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7332 00002248 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7333 0000224B 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7334 0000224F 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1

  7336 00002252 07                      		pop	es
  7337 00002253 1F                      		pop	ds

  7341

  7344 00002257 E91DFB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard

  7346                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7347                                  
  7348                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7349                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7350                                  ;
  7351                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7352                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7353                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7354                                  ;
  7355                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7356                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7357                                  ;			trash ax
  7358                                  
  7359                                  dmax_check:	
  7360 0000225A 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7361 0000225F 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7362 00002261 06                      		push	es
  7363                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7364 00002262 B85704                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7365 00002265 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7366                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7367 00002267 26C606[FF03]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7368                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7369                                  					; set message flag
  7370                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7371 0000226D 07                      		pop	es
  7372                                  
  7373                                  		;;push	es
  7374                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7375                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7376                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7377                                  					; set message flag
  7378                                  		;;pop	es
  7379                                  		;
  7380                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7381                                  dmax_ok:				
  7382 0000226E C3                      		retn
  7383                                  
  7384                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7385                                  
  7386                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7387                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7388                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7389                                  ;								 
  7390                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7391                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7392                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7393                                  
  7394                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7395 0000226F 56                      		push	si
  7396 00002270 53                      		push	bx
  7397 00002271 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7398                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7399 00002275 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7400 00002278 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7401                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7402 0000227A 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7403 0000227C EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7404                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7405                                  
  7406                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7407                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7408 0000227E 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7409                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7410 00002280 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7411                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7412 00002283 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7413                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7414 00002287 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7415                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7416                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7417 0000228A 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7418 0000228D 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7419 00002291 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7420 00002293 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7421 00002298 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7422 0000229C 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7423 000022A1 5B                      		pop	bx
  7424 000022A2 5E                      		pop	si
  7425 000022A3 C3                      		retn
  7426                                  
  7427                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7428                                  
  7429                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7430                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7431                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7432                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7433                                  
  7434                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7435 000022A4 50                      		push	ax
  7436 000022A5 51                      		push	cx
  7437 000022A6 52                      		push	dx
  7438 000022A7 55                      		push	bp
  7439 000022A8 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7440                                  loop_clock:				
  7441 000022AA 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7442 000022AC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7443 000022AE B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7444 000022B0 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7445                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7446                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7447                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7448 000022B2 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7449 000022B5 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7450 000022B7 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7451 000022BA 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7452 000022BC 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7453 000022BF 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7454 000022C1 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7455 000022C2 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7456                                  delay:					
  7457 000022C5 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7458 000022C7 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7459                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7460                                  
  7461                                  clock_present:				
  7462 000022C9 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7463 000022CF E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7464                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7465                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7466 000022D2 56                      		push	si
  7467 000022D3 E853F2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7468 000022D6 FA                      		cli
  7469                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7470 000022D7 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7471 000022DB FB                      		sti
  7472 000022DC 5E                      		pop	si
  7473                                  
  7474                                  no_readdate:				
  7475 000022DD 5D                      		pop	bp
  7476 000022DE 5A                      		pop	dx
  7477 000022DF 59                      		pop	cx
  7478 000022E0 58                      		pop	ax
  7479 000022E1 C3                      		retn
  7480                                  
  7481                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7482                                  
  7483                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7484                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7485                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7486                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7487                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7488                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7489                                  ;
  7490                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7491                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7492                                  ;
  7493                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7494                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7495                                  ;
  7496                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7497                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7498                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7499                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7500                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7501                                  ;
  7502                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7503                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7504                                  
  7505                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7506                                  
  7507                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7508                                  
  7509                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7510                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7511                                  			
  7512 000022E2 50                      		push	ax
  7513 000022E3 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7514 000022E9 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7515 000022EB 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7516                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7517 000022F1 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7518 000022F3 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7519                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7520 000022F9 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7521                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7522                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7523                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7524                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7525                                  cmosck4:				
  7526 000022FB B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7527                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7528 000022FD B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7529                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7530 000022FF E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7531 00002302 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7532                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7533 00002304 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7534 00002307 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7535                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7536 00002309 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7537 0000230B B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7538                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7539 0000230D E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7540                                  cmosck9:				
  7541 00002310 58                      		pop	ax
  7542 00002311 C3                      		retn
  7543                                  
  7544                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7545                                  
  7546                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7547                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7548                                  ;									       :
  7549                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7550                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7551                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7552                                  ;									       :
  7553                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7554                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7555                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7556                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7557                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7558                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7559                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7560                                  
  7561                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7562 00002312 9C                      		pushf
  7563 00002313 FA                      		cli
  7564 00002314 53                      		push	bx
  7565 00002315 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7566 00002316 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7567 00002318 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7568                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7569 0000231A 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7570 0000231B E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7571 0000231D 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7572 0000231F 58                      		pop	ax
  7573 00002320 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7574 00002322 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7575 00002324 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7576                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7577 00002326 90                      		nop
  7578 00002327 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7579 00002329 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7580 0000232B 5B                      		pop	bx
  7581 0000232C 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7582 0000232D E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7583 00002330 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7584                                  
  7585                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7586                                  
  7587                                  cmos_popf:				
  7588 00002331 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7589                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7590                                  
  7591                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7592                                  
  7593                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7594                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7595                                  ;									       :
  7596                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7597                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7598                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7599                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7600                                  ;									       :
  7601                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7602                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7603                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7604                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7605                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7606                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7607                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7608                                  
  7609                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7610 00002332 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7611 00002333 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7612 00002334 FA                      		cli
  7613 00002335 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7614 00002336 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7615 00002338 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7616                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7617 0000233A 90                      		nop
  7618 0000233B 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7619 0000233D E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7620 0000233F 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7621 00002340 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7622 00002342 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7623 00002344 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7624                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7625 00002346 90                      		nop
  7626 00002347 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7627 00002349 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7628 0000234A 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7629 0000234B E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7630 0000234E C3                      		retn
  7631                                  
  7632                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7633                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7634                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7635                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7636                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7637                                  
  7638                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7639                                  ;
  7640                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7641                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7642                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7643                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7644                                  
  7645                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7646                                  
  7647                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7648                                  ;
  7649                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7650                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7651                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7652                                  
  7653                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7654                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7655                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7656                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7657                                  
  7658                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7659                                  getclus:				
  7660 0000234F 51                      		push	cx
  7661 00002350 57                      		push	di
  7662 00002351 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7663 00002356 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7664 00002358 48                      		dec	ax
  7665 00002359 48                      		dec	ax
  7666 0000235A F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7667                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7668                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7669 0000235C 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7670 00002361 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7671                                  unpack:					
  7672 00002366 1E                      		push	ds
  7673 00002367 50                      		push	ax
  7674 00002368 53                      		push	bx
  7675 00002369 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7676 0000236E 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7677 00002370 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7678 00002372 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7679                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7680 00002378 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7681 0000237A D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7682                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7683 0000237C 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7684                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7685 0000237E 52                      		push	dx
  7686 0000237F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7687 00002381 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7688 00002384 5A                      		pop	dx
  7689 00002385 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7690 00002387 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7691                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7692                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7693 00002389 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7694 0000238D 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7695 0000238E 52                      		push	dx
  7696 0000238F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7697 00002391 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7698 00002394 5A                      		pop	dx
  7699                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7700 00002395 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7701 00002398 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7702 0000239C 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7703                                  even_odd:				
  7704 000023A0 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7705 000023A1 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7706 000023A2 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7707 000023A4 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7708 000023A6 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7709                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7710 000023A8 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7711 000023AA D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7712 000023AC D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7713                                  havclus:				
  7714 000023AE 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7715 000023B0 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7716 000023B4 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7717                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7718                                  
  7719                                  unpack16:				
  7720 000023B6 52                      		push	dx
  7721 000023B7 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7722 000023B9 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7723 000023BB 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7724 000023BE E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7725 000023C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  7726 000023C2 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7727                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7728                                  unpackx:				
  7729 000023C4 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7730 000023C5 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7731 000023C6 1F                      		pop	ds
  7732 000023C7 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7733 000023C9 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7734 000023CC 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7735 000023CE 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7736 000023D3 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7737                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7738                                  
  7739                                  getcl2:					
  7740 000023D5 53                      		push	bx
  7741 000023D6 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7742 000023D7 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7743 000023D8 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7744 000023DC 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7745 000023E1 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7746 000023E2 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7747                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7748 000023E7 1E                      		push	ds
  7749 000023E8 0E                      		push	cs
  7750 000023E9 1F                      		pop	ds
  7751 000023EA 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7752                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7753 000023EB BD[C508]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7754                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7755                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7756 000023EE E874F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7757 000023F1 1F                      		pop	ds
  7758 000023F2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7759 000023F3 5F                      		pop	di
  7760 000023F4 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7761 000023F8 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7762 000023FA D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7763 000023FC 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7764 000023FE 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7765 000023FF C3                      		retn
  7766                                  
  7767                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7768                                  
  7769                                  
  7770                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7771                                  ;
  7772                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7773                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7774                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7775                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7776                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7777                                  ;
  7778                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7779                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7780                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7781                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7782                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7783                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7784                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7785                                  
  7786                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7787                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7788 00002400 50                      		push	ax
  7789 00002401 51                      		push	cx
  7790 00002402 57                      		push	di
  7791 00002403 56                      		push	si
  7792 00002404 06                      		push	es
  7793 00002405 1E                      		push	ds
  7794 00002406 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7795 00002408 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7796 0000240D F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7797 0000240F 90                      		nop
  7798                                  
  7799                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7800                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7801                                  
  7802 00002410 06                      		push	es
  7803 00002411 1E                      		push	ds
  7804 00002412 57                      		push	di
  7805 00002413 50                      		push	ax
  7806 00002414 0E                      		push	cs
  7807 00002415 1F                      		pop	ds
  7808                                  
  7809 00002416 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7810 0000241A BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7811                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7812                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7813 0000241D 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7814 0000241E E844F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7815 00002421 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7816 00002422 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7817                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7818 00002426 5F                      		pop	di
  7819 00002427 1F                      		pop	ds
  7820 00002428 07                      		pop	es
  7821 00002429 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7822 0000242E 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7823 00002430 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7824                                  					; sector number
  7825                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7826 00002434 52                      		push	dx
  7827 00002435 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7828                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7829                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7830 0000243C 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7831 0000243E B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7832 00002441 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7833 00002445 1E                      		push	ds
  7834 00002446 07                      		pop	es
  7835 00002447 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7836 00002449 1E                      		push	ds
  7837 0000244A 0E                      		push	cs
  7838 0000244B 1F                      		pop	ds
  7839 0000244C 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7840 0000244D BD[C508]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7841                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7842                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7843 00002450 E812F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7844 00002453 1F                      		pop	ds
  7845 00002454 5A                      		pop	dx
  7846 00002455 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7847                                  
  7848                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7849 0000245A 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7850 0000245B 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7851                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7852                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7853 0000245D 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7854 0000245F 1F                      		pop	ds
  7855 00002460 07                      		pop	es
  7856 00002461 5E                      		pop	si
  7857 00002462 5F                      		pop	di
  7858 00002463 59                      		pop	cx
  7859 00002464 58                      		pop	ax
  7860 00002465 C3                      		retn
  7861                                  
  7862                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7863                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7864                                  
  7865                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7866                                  
  7867                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7868                                  		;db 0
  7869                                  
  7870                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7871                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7872                                  
  7873                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  7874 00002466 00<rep Ah>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7875                                  %endif
  7876                                  
  7877                                  ;align 16
  7878                                  
  7879                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7880                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7881                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7882                                  
  7883                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  7884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7885                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  7886                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  7887                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  7888                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7889                                  
  7890                                  ;============================================================================
  7891                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7892                                  ;============================================================================
  7893                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7894                                  
  7895                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7896                                  
  7897                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7898                                   
  7899                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7900                                  
  7901                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7902                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7903                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7904                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7905                                  
  7906                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7907 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7908 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7909                                  
  7910                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7911                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7912                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7913                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7914                                  
  7915                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7916                                  
  7917                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7918                                  
  7919                                  ;************************************************************************
  7920                                  ;*									*
  7921                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7922                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7923                                  ;*									*
  7924                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7925                                  ;*									*
  7926                                  ;************************************************************************
  7927                                  
  7928                                  _seg_reinit:
  7929 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7930                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7931                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7932 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7933 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7934                                  
  7935                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7936 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7937 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7938 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7939 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7940 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7941                                  
  7942                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7943                                  
  7944                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7945                                  
  7946                                  ;************************************************************************
  7947                                  ;*									*
  7948                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7949                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7950                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7951                                  ;*									*
  7952                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7953                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7954                                  ;*									*
  7955                                  ;************************************************************************
  7956                                  
  7957                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7958 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7959 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7960 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7961 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7962 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7963 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7964 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7965 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7966 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7967 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7968 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7969                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7970                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7971 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7972 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7973 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7974 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7975 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7976 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7977 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7978 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7979 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7980 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7981                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7982 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7983                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7984                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7985 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7986                                  
  7987                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7988                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7989                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7990                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7991                                  ;
  7992                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7993                                  ;
  7994                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7995                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7996                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7997                                  ;
  7998                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7999                                  
  8000                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8001 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8002 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8003 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8004 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8005                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8006                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8007 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8008 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8009                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8010                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8011 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8012 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8013 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8014 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8015 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8016 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8017 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8018 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8019 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8020 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  8021                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8022 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8023                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8024 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8025 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8026                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8027                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8028                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8029                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8030 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8031                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8032 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8033 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8034                                  					; mark operation complete
  8035 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  8036 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  8037 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  8038 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  8039 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  8040 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  8041 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  8042 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  8043 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  8044 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8045                                  	
  8046                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8047                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8048                                  bc_retf:
  8049 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8050                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8051                                  
  8052                                  command_error:				
  8053 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8054 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8055                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8056                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8057                                  
  8058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8059                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8060                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8061                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8062                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8063                                  ; high.
  8064                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8065                                  
  8066                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8067                                  
  8068                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8069                                  
  8070 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8071                                  
  8072 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8073                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8074                                  		
  8075                                  
  8076                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8077                                  
  8078                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8079                                  
  8080                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8081 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8082                                  					; unknown command error
  8083                                  
  8084                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8085                                  
  8086                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8087                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8088                                  
  8089                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8090                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8091                                  
  8092                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8093                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8094                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8095 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8096 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8097                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8098 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8099 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8100 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8101                                  
  8102                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8103                                  
  8104                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8105                                  
  8106                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8107                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8108                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8109                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8110                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8111                                  
  8112                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8113                                  
  8114                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8115                                  
  8116                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8117                                  
  8118                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8119                                  
  8120                                  ;************************************************************************
  8121                                  ;*									*
  8122                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8123                                  ;*									*
  8124                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8125                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8126                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8127                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8128                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8129                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8130                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8131                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8132                                  ;*									*
  8133                                  ;************************************************************************
  8134                                  
  8135                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8136                                  		;db 0
  8137                                  
  8138                                  		; 13/12/202
  8139 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8140                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8141 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8142                                  					; 00 init
  8143 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8144 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8145 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
