  8146                                  					; 03
  8147 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8148                                  					; 04
  8149 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8150                                  					; 05
  8151 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8152 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8153                                  					; 07
  8154 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8155                                  					; 08
  8156 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8157 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8158                                  con_table_end:
  8159 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8160                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8161 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8162 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8163 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8164 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8165 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8166                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8167 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8168                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8169 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8170 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8171 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8172 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8173 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8174 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8175 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8176 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8177 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8178 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8179 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8180 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8181 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8182 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8183 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8184 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8185 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8186 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8187 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8188 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8189                                  prn_table_end:
  8190 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8191                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8192 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8193 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8194 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8195 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8196 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8197 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8198 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8199 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8200 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8201 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8202 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8203                                  aux_table_end:
  8204 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8205                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8206 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8207 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8208 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8209 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8210 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8211 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8212 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8213 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8214 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8215 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8216                                  tim_table_end:
  8217                                  
  8218                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8219                                  
  8220                                  ;************************************************************************
  8221                                  ;*									*
  8222                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8223                                  ;*									*
  8224                                  ;************************************************************************
  8225                                  
  8226                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8227                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8228 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8229                                  con_loop:				
  8230 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8231 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8232 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8233                                  con_exit:				
  8234 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8235 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8236                                  
  8237                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8238                                  
  8239                                  ;************************************************************************
  8240                                  ;*									*
  8241                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8242                                  ;*									*
  8243                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8244                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8245                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8246                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8247                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8248                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8249                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8250                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8251                                  ;*									*
  8252                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8253                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8254                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8255                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8256                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8257                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8258                                  ;*									*
  8259                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8260                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8261                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8262                                  ;*									*
  8263                                  ;************************************************************************
  8264                                  
  8265                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8266                                  chrin:		
  8267 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8268 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8269 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8270 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8271 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8272 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8273 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8274 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8275 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8276 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8277 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8278 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8279                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8280                                  
  8281                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8282                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8283                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8284                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8285                                  ;      else
  8286                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8287                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8288                                  ;      endif
  8289                                  ;    endif
  8290                                  ;  endif
  8291                                  
  8292                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8293 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8294 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8295 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8296 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8297 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8298 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8299 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8300 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8301                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8302                                  
  8303                                  not_ext:				
  8304 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8305 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8306                                  alt_save:				
  8307 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8308                                  keyret:					
  8309 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8310                                  
  8311                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8312                                  
  8313                                  ;************************************************************************
  8314                                  ;*									*
  8315                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8316                                  ;*									*
  8317                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8318                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8319                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8320                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8321                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8322                                  ;*									*
  8323                                  ;************************************************************************
  8324                                  
  8325                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8326                                  con_rdnd:				
  8327 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8328 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8329 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8330 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8331 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8332 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8333 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8334 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8335 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8336                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8337 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8338                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8339 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8340 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8341 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8342 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8343                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8344                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8345                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8346                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8347 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8348 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8349 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8350                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8351                                  
  8352                                  gotchr:					
  8353 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8354 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8355 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8356 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8357 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8359                                  
  8360                                  notbrk:					
  8361 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8362 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8363 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8364 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8365                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8366                                  
  8367                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8368 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8369 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8370 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8371 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8372 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8373 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8374 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8375                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8376                                  rdexit:					
  8377 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8378 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8379                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8380                                  bc_exvec:				
  8381 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8382                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8383 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8384                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8385                                  
  8386                                  ;************************************************************************
  8387                                  ;*									*
  8388                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8389                                  ;*									*
  8390                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8391                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8392                                  ;*									*
  8393                                  ;************************************************************************
  8394                                  
  8395                                  con_writ:
  8396                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8397 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8398                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8399                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8400                                  con_lp:					
  8401 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8402 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8403 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8404                                  					; AL = character to display
  8405 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8406                                  cc_ret:					
  8407 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8408 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8409                                  
  8410                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8411                                  
  8412                                  ;************************************************************************
  8413                                  ;*									*
  8414                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8415                                  ;*									*
  8416                                  ;************************************************************************
  8417                                  
  8418                                  con_flush:
  8419 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8420                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8421 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8422 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8423                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8424                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8425                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8426 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8427 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8428 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8429                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8430 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8431                                  
  8432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8433                                  
  8434                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8435                                  
  8436                                  ;************************************************************************
  8437                                  ;*									*
  8438                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8439                                  ;*									*
  8440                                  ;************************************************************************
  8441                                  
  8442                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8443                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8444                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8445                                  
  8446                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8447                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8448                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8449                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8450                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8451                                  ;
  8452                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8453                                  
  8454                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8455                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8456                                  
  8457                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8458                                  
  8459                                  ;************************************************************************
  8460                                  ;*									*
  8461                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8462                                  ;*									*
  8463                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8464                                  ;*									*
  8465                                  ;************************************************************************
  8466                                  
  8467                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8468 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8469                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8470                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8471                                  prn_done:
  8472 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8473 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8474                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8475                                  
  8476                                  ;************************************************************************
  8477                                  ;*									*
  8478                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8479                                  ;*									*
  8480                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8481                                  ;*									*
  8482                                  ;************************************************************************
  8483                                  
  8484                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8485                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8486 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8487                                  prn_loop:				
  8488 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8489                                  prn_out:				
  8490 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8491 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8492 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8493 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8494 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8495 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8496 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8497 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8498 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8499 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8500 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8501                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8502                                  
  8503                                  _prnwf:					
  8504 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8505 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8506                                  TestPrnError:				
  8507 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8508 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8509                                  pmessg:					
  8510 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  8512

  8517                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8518                                  prn_done2:
  8519                                  		;clc
  8520                                  		; cf=0
  8521 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8522                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8523                                  
  8524                                  ;************************************************************************
  8525                                  ;*									*
  8526                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8527                                  ;*									*
  8528                                  ;************************************************************************
  8529                                  
  8530                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8531 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8532 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8533 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8534                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8535                                  		; 12/12/2022

  8537 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8538                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8539                                  
  8540                                  ;************************************************************************
  8541                                  ;*									*
  8542                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8543                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8544                                  ;*									*
  8545                                  ;************************************************************************
  8546                                  
  8547                                  prnstat:				
  8548 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8549                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8550                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8551                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8552                                  
  8553                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8554                                  
  8555                                  ;************************************************************************
  8556                                  ;*									*
  8557                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8558                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8559                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8560                                  ;*									*
  8561                                  ;************************************************************************
  8562                                  
  8563                                  prnop:	
  8564 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8565 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8566                                  
  8567                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8568                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8569                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8570                                  
  8571 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8572 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8573 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8574 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8575 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8576 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8577 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8578                                  
  8579                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8580                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8581                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8582                                  
  8583                                  NextTest:				
  8584 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8585                                  					; i/o error?
  8586 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8587                                  
  8588                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8589                                  
  8590 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8591                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8592 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8593 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8594 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8595                                  ret1:					
  8596 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8597                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8598                                  
  8599                                  checknotready:				
  8600 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8601 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8602 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8603                                  
  8604                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8605                                  
  8606                                  ;************************************************************************
  8607                                  ;*									*
  8608                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8609                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8610                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8611                                  ;*									*
  8612                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8613                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8614                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8615                                  ;*									*
  8616                                  ;************************************************************************
  8617                                  
  8618                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8619                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8620 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8621                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8622 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8623 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8624 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8625 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8626 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8627                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8628 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8629 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8630                                  prn_getstat:				
  8631 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8632 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8633 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8634 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8635 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8636 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8637 000002A6 26                      		es
  8638 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8639                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8640                                  					; lodsb
  8641 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8642 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8643 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8644 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8645                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8646                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8647                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8648 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8649                                  
  8650                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8651                                  
  8652                                  prn_bperr:				
  8653 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8654                                  prn_berr:				
  8655 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8656                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8657                                  
  8658                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8659                                  
  8660                                  ;************************************************************************
  8661                                  ;*									*
  8662                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8663                                  ;*									*
  8664                                  ;************************************************************************
  8665                                  
  8666                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8667                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8668                                  
  8669                                  ;********************************;*
  8670                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8671                                  ;********************************;*
  8672                                  
  8673                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8674                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8675                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8676                                  
  8677                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8678                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8679                                  ;;endstruc
  8680                                  
  8681                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8682                                  
  8683                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8684                                  
  8685                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8686                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8687 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8688 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8689                                  					; ioc_pc
  8690 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8691                                  
  8692                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8693 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8694                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8695                                  
  8696                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8697 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8698 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8699 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8700                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8701 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8702 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8703                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8704 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8705 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8706 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8707 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8708 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8709 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8710                                  prngetcount:				
  8711                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8712 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8713 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8714                                  					; return current retry count
  8715                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8716                                  		; cf=0
  8717                                  		;clc
  8718 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8719                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8720                                  
  8721                                  ;************************************************************************
  8722                                  ;*									*

  8727

  8749                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8750                                  
  8751                                  ;************************************************************************
  8752                                  ;*									*
  8753                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8754                                  ;*									*
  8755                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8756                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8757                                  ;*									*
  8758                                  ;************************************************************************
  8759                                  
  8760                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8761                                  
  8762                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8763                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8764                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8765                                  
  8766                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8767                                  
  8768                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8769                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8770                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8771                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8772                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8773                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8774                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8775                                  
  8776                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8777                                  
  8778                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8779                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8780                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8781                                  
  8782                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8783                                  
  8784                                  ;************************************************************************
  8785                                  ;*									*
  8786                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8787                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8788                                  ;*									*
  8789                                  ;************************************************************************
  8790                                  
  8791                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8792                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8793 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8794 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8795 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8796 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8797 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8798 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8799                                  aux1:					
  8800 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8801                                  					; won't return if error
  8802                                  aux2:					
  8803 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8804 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8805                                  exvec2:					
  8806 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8807                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8808 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8809                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8810                                  
  8811                                  ;************************************************************************
  8812                                  ;*									*
  8813                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8814                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8815                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8816                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8817                                  ;*									*
  8818                                  ;************************************************************************
  8819                                  
  8820                                  auxin:					
  8821 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8822 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8823 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8824                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8825                                  		;retn
  8826                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8827 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8828                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8829                                  
  8830                                  arbad:					
  8831 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8832 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8833 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8834 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8835                                  
  8836                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8837                                  
  8838                                  ;************************************************************************
  8839                                  ;*									*
  8840                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8841                                  ;*									*
  8842                                  ;************************************************************************
  8843                                  
  8844                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8845 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  8846 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8847 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8848 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8849 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8850 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8851 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8852 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8853 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8854 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8855 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8856                                  auxdrx:					
  8857 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8858                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8859                                  
  8860                                  auxbus:					
  8861 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit

  8863                                  
  8864                                  ;************************************************************************
  8865                                  ;*									*
  8866                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8867                                  ;*									*
  8868                                  ;************************************************************************
  8869                                  
  8870                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
