 10412                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10413                                  
 10414                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10415                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10416                                  
 10417                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10418                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10419                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10420                                  
 10421                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10422                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10423                                  ;
 10424                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 10425                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10426                                  
 10427                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10428                                  checksingle:		
 10429 0000083C 50                      		push	ax
 10430 0000083D 53                      		push	bx
 10431 0000083E 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10432                                  
 10433                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10434                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10435                                  
 10436 00000842 F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10437 00000845 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10438 00000847 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10439                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10440 0000084A 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10441                                  
 10442                                  
 10443                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10444                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10445                                  
 10446 0000084C 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10447                                  					; get physical drive number
 10448 00000850 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10449 00000851 57                      		push	di
 10450 00000852 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10451                                  scan_list:				
 10452 00000856 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10453 0000085A 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10454 0000085C B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10455 0000085E 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10456 00000862 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10457 00000864 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10458 00000868 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10459 00000869 07                      		pop	es
 10460 0000086A 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10461                                  
 10462                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10463                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10464                                  ; in this case.
 10465 0000086E 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 10466 00000873 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 10467                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10468 00000875 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10469 0000087A 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10470 0000087C 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 10471                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 10472                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10473 00000880 06                      		push	es
 10474 00000881 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10475 00000885 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 10476                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10477                                  					; set up sdsb
 10478 00000889 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
 10479 0000088A EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 10480                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10481                                  
 10482                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10483                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 10484                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 10485                                  
 10486                                  not_fsetowner:				
 10487 0000088C 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2 ; if (single_drive_system)
 10488 00000891 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 10489 00000893 50                      		push	ax
 10490 00000894 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 10491 00000898 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 10492 0000089A 06                      		push	es
 10493 0000089B 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10494 0000089F 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
 10495                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10496                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10497 000008A4 07                      		pop	es
 10498 000008A5 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
 10499 000008A7 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10500 000008A8 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
 10501                                  ignore_sdsb:				
 10502 000008AA E8800E                  		call	swpdsk
 10503 000008AD EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
 10504                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10505                                  
 10506                                  scan_skip:	
 10507 000008AF 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]			
 10508                                  		;les	di, es:[di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 10509                                  					; go to	next bds
 10510 000008B2 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
 10511 000008B5 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 10512 000008B7 F9                      		stc
 10513 000008B8 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 10514 000008B9 07                      		pop	es
 10515                                  
 10516                                  singleret:

 10518 000008BB 58                      		pop	ax

 10522                                  
 10523                                  baddrive:

 10527

 10536                                  
 10537                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10538                                  
 10539                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10540                                  
 10541                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10542                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10543                                  ;
 10544                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10545                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10546                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10547                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10548                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10549                                  ;	ds = cs
 10550                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10551                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10552                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10553                                  ;
 10554                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10555                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10556                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10557                                  
 10558                                  diskrd:	
 10559                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10560                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10561 000008C5 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10562                                  
 10563                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10564                                  
 10565                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10566                                  diskio:
 10567 000008CA 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10568 000008CC 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10569 000008D0 E8F8FB                  		call	SetDrive
 10570 000008D3 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10571 000008D7 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10572                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10573 000008DA E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10574                                  
 10575                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10576                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10577                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10578                                  
 10579 000008DC 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10580                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10581                                  					; unformatted_media
 10582 000008E1 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10583 000008E3 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10584 000008E7 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10585                                  
 10586                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10587                                  
 10588 000008EB 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10589 000008ED 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10590 000008EF 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10591 000008F1 83D600                  		adc	si, 0
 10592 000008F4 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10593                                  					; > 32 bit sector ?
 10594 000008F9 740D                    		jz	short sanity32
 10595 000008FB 83FE00                  		cmp	si, 0
 10596 000008FE 75BD                    		jnz	short baddrive
 10597 00000900 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10598 00000904 77B7                    		ja	short baddrive
 10599 00000906 EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 10600                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10601                                  
 10602                                  sanity32:				
 10603 00000908 0336[2B05]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 10604 0000090C 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 10605 00000910 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 10606 00000912 77A9                    		ja	short baddrive
 10607 00000914 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 10608 00000918 77A3                    		ja	short baddrive
 10609                                  
 10610                                  sanityok:				
 10611 0000091A 8B16[2B05]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 10612 0000091E 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 10613 00000922 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 10614                                  
 10615                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 10616                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 10617                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 10618                                  
 10619 00000926 A3[2D05]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 10620                                  
 10621                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 10622                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 10623                                  
 10624 00000929 06                      		push	es
 10625 0000092A 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10626 0000092E 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 10627                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 10628                                  					; current disk parm table
 10629 00000933 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 10630 00000937 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es
 10631 0000093B 07                      		pop	es
 10632 0000093C 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10633                                  					; fnon_removable
 10634 00000941 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup
 10635 00000943 E8F6FE                  		call	checksingle
 10636

 11009                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11010                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft

 11064                                  
 11065                                  write_fault_err:			
 11066 00000B7C BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11067                                  					; for write fault error.
 11068 00000B7F EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11069                                  
 11070                                  		; fall into harderr
 11071                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11072                                  
 11073                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11074                                  
 11075                                  harderr:				
 11076 00000B81 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11077                                  harderr2:				
 11078 00000B84 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11079                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11080 00000B89 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11081 00000B8D 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11082                                  
 11083                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11084                                  
 11085                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11086                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11087 00000B91 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11088                                  
 11089                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11090                                  
 11091                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11092                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11093                                  
 11094                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11095                                  normspeed:
 11096 00000B94 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11097 00000B99 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11098 00000B9B 06                      		push	es
 11099 00000B9C 50                      		push	ax
 11100 00000B9D A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11101 00000BA0 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11102 00000BA4 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11103 00000BA8 58                      		pop	ax
 11104 00000BA9 07                      		pop	es
 11105 00000BAA E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11106 00000BAD 06                      		push	es
 11107 00000BAE C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11108 00000BB2 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11109                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11110 00000BB7 07                      		pop	es
 11111 00000BB8 C3                      		retn
 11112                                  
 11113                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11114                                  
 11115                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11116                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11117                                  
 11118                                  fastspeed:		
 11119 00000BB9 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11120                                  					; ftoobig
 11121 00000BBE 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11122 00000BC0 06                      		push	es
 11123 00000BC1 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11124 00000BC5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11125 00000BC7 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11126 00000BCB 07                      		pop	es
 11127 00000BCC C3                      		retn
 11128                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11129                                  
 11130                                  notready:				
 11131 00000BCD F9                      		stc
 11132 00000BCE B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11133 00000BD0 C3                      		retn
 11134                                  
 11135                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11136                                  
 11137                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11138                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11139                                  
 11140                                  maperror:	
 11141 00000BD1 51                      		push	cx
 11142 00000BD2 06                      		push	es
 11143 00000BD3 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11144 00000BD4 07                      		pop	es
 11145 00000BD5 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11146 00000BD7 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11147 00000BDA B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11148                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11149 00000BDD BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11150 00000BE0 F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11151                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11152 00000BE2 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11153                                  					; get translation
 11154                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11155                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11156 00000BE5 07                      		pop	es
 11157 00000BE6 59                      		pop	cx
 11158 00000BE7 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11159 00000BE8 C3                      		retn
 11160                                  
 11161                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11162                                  
 11163                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11164                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11165                                  
 11166                                  set_tim:		
 11167 00000BE9 50                      		push	ax
 11168 00000BEA E88DF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11169                                  
 11170                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11171                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11172                                  
 11173 00000BED 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11174 00000BF1 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11175 00000BF3 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11176                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11177                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11178 00000BF7 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11179                                  setaccess:				
 11180 00000BF9 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11181 00000BFE 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11182 00000C02 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11183                                  done_set:				
 11184 00000C06 F8                      		clc
 11185                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11186 00000C07 58                      		pop	ax
 11187 00000C08 C3                      		retn
 11188                                  
 11189                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11190                                  
 11191                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11192                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11193                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11194                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11195                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11196                                  
 11197                                  again:	
 11198 00000C09 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11199 00000C0C 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11200 00000C0F 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11201                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11202 00000C11 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11203 00000C12 C3                      		retn
 11204                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11205                                  
 11206                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11207 00000C13 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11208 00000C15 C3                      		retn

 11223                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11224                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11225                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -

 11314                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11315                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11316                                  ;
 11317                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11318                                  ;
 11319                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11320                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11321                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11322                                  ;
 11323                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11324                                  
 11325                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11326                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11327                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11328 00000C46 E882F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11329 00000C49 06                      		push	es
 11330 00000C4A C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11331 00000C4E 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11332                                  					; RAWIO
 11333 00000C53 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11334 00000C57 07                      		pop	es
 11335 00000C58 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11336                                  
 11337                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11338                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11339                                  
 11340                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11341 00000C5A BE[170C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11342                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11343                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11344 00000C5D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11345 00000C5F 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11346                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11347 00000C61 BE[2A0C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11348                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11349                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11350                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11351 00000C64 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11352 00000C66 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11353 00000C68 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11354 00000C6B 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11355 00000C6D 98                      		cbw
 11356 00000C6E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11357 00000C70 46                      		inc	si
 11358 00000C71 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11359 00000C73 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11360                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11361 00000C76 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11362                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11363                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11364 00000C7B B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11365 00000C7D C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11366                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11367                                  
 11368                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11369                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11370                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11371 00000C7E 5A                      		pop	dx
 11372                                  
 11373                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11374 00000C7F E953F4                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 11376

 11379                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11380                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11381                                  ;
 11382                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11383                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11384                                  ;
 11385                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11386                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11387                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11388                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11389                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11390                                  
 11391                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11392                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11393                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11394                                  
 11395 00000C82 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11396 00000C86 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11397                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11398 00000C89 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11399 00000C8D 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11400 00000C90 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11401 00000C94 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11402                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11403 00000C97 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11404 00000C9A 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11405 00000C9E 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11406 00000CA1 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11407 00000CA3 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11408                                  					
 11409                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11410 00000CA6 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11411 00000CA9 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11412                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11413 00000CAC 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11414 00000CAE 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11415 00000CAF 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11416                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11417                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11418                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11419 00000CB4 E885FB                  		call	checksingle
 11420 00000CB7 E83EF9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11421 00000CBA 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11422 00000CBB 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11423 00000CBD 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11424                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11425                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11426 00000CC0 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11427                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 11428 00000CC3 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11429                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11430 00000CC6 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11431 00000CC7 06                      		push	es
 11432 00000CC8 1F                      		pop	ds
 11433 00000CC9 07                      		pop	es
 11434 00000CCA F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11435                                  		
 11436                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11437                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11438                                  		;clc
 11439                                  GetParmRet:				
 11440 00000CCC C3                      		retn
 11441                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11442                                  
 11443                                  ; 17/10/2022
 11444                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11445                                  
 11446                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11447                                  ; SetDeviceParameters:
 11448                                  ;
 11449                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11450                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11451                                  
 11452                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11453                                  SetDeviceParameters:			; 2C7h:0CF3h = 70h:3263h
 11454 00000CCD C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11455 00000CD1 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]

 11457                                  					; fchanged_by_format|fchanged

 11459                                  					; ONLY_SET_TRACKLAYOUT
 11460 00000CDD 7579                    		jnz	short setTrackTable
 11461 00000CDF 8A4701                  		mov	al, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11462 00000CE2 26884522                		mov	[es:di+34], al	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11463 00000CE6 8B4704                  		mov	ax, [bx+4]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11464 00000CE9 26894525                		mov	[es:di+37], ax	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11465 00000CED 8B4702                  		mov	ax, [bx+2]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11466 00000CF0 1E                      		push	ds
 11467                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11468 00000CF1 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11469                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11470                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11471                                  		;cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11472 00000CF6 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11473 00000CFB 1F                      		pop	ds
 11474 00000CFC 7502                    		jnz	short HaveChange ; we have changeline support
 11475                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11476 00000CFE 24FD                    		and	al, 0FDh
 11477                                  		;and	ax, 0FFFDh	; ~fchangeline
 11478                                  
 11479                                  		; Ignore all bits except non_removable and changeline
 11480                                  HaveChange:				
 11481 00000D00 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable|fchangeline
 11482 00000D03 268B4D23                		mov	cx, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]

 11601                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11602                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11603                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11604                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11605                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11606                                  ;
 11607                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11608                                  ;
 11609                                  ; output:
 11610                                  ;	for status call:
 11611                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11612                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11613                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11614                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11615                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11616                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11617                                  ;
 11618                                  ;	for format track:
 11619                                  ;		carry set if error
 11620                                  ;
 11621                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11622                                  
 11623                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11624

 11773                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11774                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11775                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11776                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11777                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11778                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11779                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11780                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11781                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 11783                                  		; register.

 11886                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11887                                  
 11888                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11889                                  
 11890                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11891                                  ;
 11892                                  ; TrackIo:
 11893                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11894                                  ;
 11895                                  ;   input:
 11896                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11897                                  ;		  3 = write
 11898                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11899                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11900                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11901                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11902                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11903                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11904                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11905                                  ;
 11906                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11907                                  
 11908                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11909                                  		
 11910                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11911                                  TrackIo:

 12013                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12014                                  ;
 12015                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12016                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12017                                  ; are permissible.
 12018                                  ;
 12019                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12020                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12021                                  ; All other registers preserved

 12030 00000F79 C3                      		retn

 12122                                  
 12123                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12124                                  
 12125                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12126                                  ;
 12127                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12128                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12129                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12130                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12131                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12132                                  ;
 12133                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12134                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12135                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12136                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12137                                  ;
 12138                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12139                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12140                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12141                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12142                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12143                                  ;
 12144                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12145                                  
 12146                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12147                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12148 00000FE6 51                      		push	cx
 12149 00000FE7 52                      		push	dx
 12150                                  
 12151                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12152                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12153                                  
 12154 00000FE8 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12155 00000FED 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12156 00000FEF 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12157 00000FF1 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12158 00000FF6 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12159 00000FF8 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12160                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12161                                  
 12162                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12163 00000FFA 06                      		push	es
 12164 00000FFB 56                      		push	si

 12166 00001000 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 12168                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table

 12173                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.

 12194                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12195 00001032 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12196 00001034 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12197 00001039 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting

 12199 0000103C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12200 00001040 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 12202                                  					; Get current disk base	table

 12266                                  
 12267                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12268                                  ;
 12269                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12270                                  ;
 12271                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12272                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12273                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12274                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12275                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12276                                  ;
 12277                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12278                                  
 12279                                  ResetDisk:	
 12280 0000107C 50                      		push	ax
 12281 0000107D 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12282                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12283 00001082 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12284                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12285 00001084 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12286                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12287 00001089 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12288 0000108B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12289                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12290 0000108D C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12291                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12292 00001092 58                      		pop	ax
 12293 00001093 C3                      		retn
 12294                                  
 12295                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12296                                  
 12297                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12298                                  
 12299                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12300                                  ;
 12301                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12302                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12303                                  ;
 12304                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12305                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12306                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12307                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12308                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12309                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12310                                  ;
 12311                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12312                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12313                                  ;
 12314                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12315                                  
 12316                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12317                                  ToRom:	
 12318 00001094 53                      		push	bx
 12319 00001095 56                      		push	si
 12320                                  
 12321                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12322                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12323                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12324                                  
 12325 00001096 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 12333                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12334 000010A9 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12335                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12336                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12337 000010AE 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12338 000010B2 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12339

 12344                                  					; Important for	format
 12345 000010C4 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12346                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12347                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12348 000010C9 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12349 000010CA 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12350 000010CC 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12351                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12352 000010D1 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12353 000010D2 58                      		pop	ax
 12354                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12355 000010D3 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12356 000010D7 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12357 000010D9 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12358 000010DD 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12359 000010E1 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12360 000010E2 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12361 000010E6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12362 000010E8 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12363 000010E9 5E                      		pop	si
 12364 000010EA 5B                      		pop	bx
 12365 000010EB C3                      		retn

 12368                                  
 12369                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12370                                  
 12371                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12372                                  
 12373                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12374                                  ;
 12375                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12376                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12377                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12378                                  ;
 12379                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12380                                  
 12381                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12382                                  ioctl_getown:
 12383 000010EC E8DCF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12384 000010EF 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12385                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12386 000010F3 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12387                                  ownloop:				
 12388 000010F7 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12389 000010FB 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12390                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12391 000010FD 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12392                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12393                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12394 00001102 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12395                                  getnextBDS:				
 12396 00001104 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12397 00001107 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12398                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12399                                  
 12400                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12401                                  ;
 12402                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12403                                  ; in al to al.
 12404                                  ;
 12405                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12406                                  
 12407                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12408                                  ioctl_setown:
 12409 00001109 E8BFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12410 0000110C C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12411                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12412 00001111 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12413 00001114 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12414                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12415                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12416                                  
 12417                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12418                                  ;
 12419                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12420                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12421                                  ;
 12422                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12423                                  
 12424                                  exitown:				
 12425 00001119 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12426                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12427 0000111B 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12428                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12429                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12430 00001120 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12431 00001122 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12432                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12433                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12434 00001126 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12435                                  exitnomult:				
 12436 00001128 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12437 0000112C 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12438                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12439                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12440                                  		; cf=0
 12441                                  		;clc
 12442 0000112F C3                      		retn
