 14309                                  
 14310                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14311                                  
 14312                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14313                                  
 14314                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14315                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14316                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14317                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14318                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14319                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14320                                  
 14321                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14322 0000176F 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14323 00001771 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14323 0000177A 736B6574746520666F-
 14323 00001783 7220647269766520   
 14324                                  
 14325                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14326 0000178B 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14326 00001794 65737320616E79206B-
 14326 0000179D 6579207768656E2072-
 14326 000017A6 656164790D0A       
 14327 000017AC 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14328                                  
 14329                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14330                                  
 14331                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14332                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14333                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14334                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14335                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14336                                  
 14337                                  chkopcnt:		
 14338 000017AE 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14339 000017B3 C3                      		retn
 14340                                  
 14341                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14342                                  
 14343                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14344                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14345                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14346                                  ;
 14347                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14348                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14349                                  
 14350                                  mediacheck:	
 14351 000017B4 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14352 000017B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14353 000017B9 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14354 000017BC 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14355 000017BE E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14356 000017C1 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14357 000017C3 50                      		push	ax
 14358 000017C4 52                      		push	dx
 14359 000017C5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14360                                  					; set logical drive number
 14361 000017C9 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14362 000017CB CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14363                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14364                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14365 000017CD 5A                      		pop	dx
 14366 000017CE 58                      		pop	ax
 14367 000017CF 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14368 000017D1 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14369                                  
 14370                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14371                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14372                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14373                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14374                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14375                                  ; status.
 14376                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14377 000017D4 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14378 000017D8 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14379                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14380                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14381                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14382                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14383 000017DC 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14384                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14385                                  
 14386                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14387                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14388                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14389                                  
 14390 000017DE 50                      		push	ax
 14391 000017DF 51                      		push	cx
 14392 000017E0 52                      		push	dx
 14393 000017E1 E86FED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14394 000017E4 5A                      		pop	dx
 14395 000017E5 59                      		pop	cx
 14396 000017E6 58                      		pop	ax
 14397 000017E7 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14398 000017E9 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14399                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14400 000017EB 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14401                                  mediaret:				
 14402 000017ED C3                      		retn
 14403                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14404                                  
 14405                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14406                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14407                                  ; or write.
 14408                                  
 14409                                  mediadovolid:				
 14410 000017EE E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14411 000017F1 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14412 000017F3 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14413 000017F6 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14414 000017F8 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14415                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14416                                  
 14417                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14418                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14419                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14420                                  ; dos.
 14421                                  ;
 14422                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14423                                  
 14424                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14425                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14426                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14427                                  
 14428                                  checklatchio:	
 14429                                  
 14430                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14431                                  			
 14432 000017FB E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14433 000017FE 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14434                                  
 14435                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14436                                  
 14437 00001800 E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14438 00001803 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14439                                  
 14440                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14441                                  ; expensive verification.
 14442                                  
 14443 00001805 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14444 00001808 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14445 0000180A E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14446 0000180D 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14447 0000180F 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14448 00001811 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14449 00001813 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14450                                  checklatchret:				
 14451 00001816 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14452                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14453 00001819 F9                      		stc
 14454 0000181A 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14455                                  checkret:				
 14456 0000181B C3                      		retn
 14457                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14458                                  
 14459                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14460                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14461                                  ;
 14462                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14463                                  
 14464                                  checkfatvid:				
 14465 0000181C E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14466 0000181F 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14467 00001821 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14468                                  
 14469                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14470                                  
 14471                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14472                                  
 14473                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14474                                  
 14475                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14476                                  ;
 14477                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14478                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14479                                  ;
 14480                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14481                                  ;
 14482                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14483                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14484                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14485                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14486                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14487                                  ;
 14488                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14489                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14490                                  ; routine.)
 14491                                  ;
 14492                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14493                                  
 14494                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14495                                  check_vid:
 14496                                  
 14497                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14498                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14499                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14500                                  
 14501 00001823 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14502                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14503                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14504 00001828 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14505 0000182A E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14506 0000182D 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14507 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14508 00001831 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14509                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14510 00001836 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14511                                  					; if not fat system
 14512 00001838 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14513 0000183B 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14514 0000183D E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14515 00001840 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14516                                  					; definitely changed
 14517 00001843 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14518                                  
 14519 00001845 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14520                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14521 00001846 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14522                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14523                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14524                                  		;clc
 14525                                  checkfatret:				
 14526 00001849 C3                      		retn
 14527                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14528                                  
 14529                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14530                                  changed_drv:
 14531 0000184A F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14532 0000184B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14533                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14534 00001850 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14535                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14536                                  
 14537                                  ; extended id check
 14538                                  
 14539                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14540                                  
 14541                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14542                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14543                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14544                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14545                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14546                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14547                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14548                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14549                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14550                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14551                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14552                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14553                                  ;
 14554                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14555                                  
 14556                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14557                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14558 00001851 50                      		push	ax
 14559                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14560                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14561 00001852 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14562 00001855 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14563 00001859 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14564 0000185B A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14565 0000185E 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14566 00001862 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14567 00001864 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14568                                  					; don't know
 14569 00001866 58                      		pop	ax
 14570 00001867 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14571                                  					; reset the flag
 14572                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14573                                  
 14574                                  ext_changed:				
 14575 00001869 58                      		pop	ax
 14576 0000186A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14577                                  					; disk changed!
 14578                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14579                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14580                                  		;clc
 14581 0000186D EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14582                                  
 14583                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14584                                  
 14585                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14586                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14587                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14588                                  ;
 14589                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14590                                  
 14591                                  checkio:				
 14592 0000186F 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14593 00001872 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14594 00001874 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14595 00001877 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14596 00001879 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14597 0000187C 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14598 0000187E E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14599 00001881 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14600 00001883 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14601 00001885 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14602 00001887 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14603 00001888 C3                      		retn
 14604                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14605                                  
 14606                                  checkioerr:				
 14607 00001889 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14608                                  
 14609                                  checkioret:				
 14610 0000188C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14611 0000188D E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14612                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14613                                  
 14614                                  no_error_map:				
 14615 00001890 E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14616                                  
 14617                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14618                                  
 14619                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14620                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14621                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14622                                  
 14623                                  returnvid:		
 14624 00001893 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14625                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14626 00001896 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14627 00001899 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14628 0000189B F9                      		stc
 14629 0000189C C3                      		retn
 14630                                  
 14631                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14632                                  
 14633                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14634                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14635                                  ;
 14636                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14637                                  ; **trashes si**
 14638                                  
 14639                                  media_set_vid:				
 14640 0000189D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14641                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14642                                  
 14643                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14644                                  
 14645                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14646                                  
 14647                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14648                                  
 14649                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14650                                  vid_into_packet:
 14651 000018A0 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14652 000018A1 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14653 000018A5 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14654 000018A8 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14655 000018AA 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14656 000018AD 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14657 000018B0 1F                      		pop	ds
 14658                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14659 000018B1 C3                      		retn
 14660                                  
 14661                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14662                                  
 14663                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14664                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14665                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14666                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14667                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14668                                  ;
 14669                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14670                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14671                                  ;
 14672                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14673                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14674                                  ;		carry set
 14675                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14676                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14677                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14678                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14679                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14680                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14681                                  ;
 14682                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14683                                  
 14684                                  hidensity:
 14685                                  
 14686                                  ; check for correct drive
 14687                                  		
 14688                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14689 000018B2 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14690                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14691                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14692 000018B7 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14693                                  
 14694                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14695                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14696                                  
 14697 000018B9 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14698 000018BE 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14699                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14700                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14701 000018C0 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14702 000018C3 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14703                                  
 14704                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14705                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14706                                  
 14707 000018C5 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14708                                  					; ffOther
 14709 000018CA 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14710 000018CC 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14711                                  					; ff288
 14712 000018D1 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14713 000018D3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14714 000018D5 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14715                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14716                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14717 000018D8 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14718                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14719                                  					; 2 sides
 14720 000018DB BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14721                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14722                                  					; & head max
 14723 000018DE 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14724 000018E1 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14725                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14726                                  
 14727                                  Is720K:					
 14728 000018E4 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14729 000018E7 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14730                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14731                                  
 14732                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14733                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14734                                  		;retn
 14735                                  
 14736                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14737                                  
 14738                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14739                                  
 14740                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14741                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14742                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14743                                  ;
 14744                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14745                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14746                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14747                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14748                                  ;
 14749                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14750                                  ;
 14751                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14752                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14753                                  
 14754                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14755 000018EA 06                      		push	es
 14756 000018EB 57                      		push	di
 14757                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14758                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14759 000018EC C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14760                                  
 14761                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14762                                  
 14763                                  scan_bds:				
 14764 000018F0 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14765 000018F4 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14766                                  
 14767                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14768                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14769                                  
 14770 000018F6 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14771                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14772                                  get_next_bds:				
 14773 000018FA 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14774                                  					; go to	next bds
 14775 000018FD 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14776 00001900 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14777 00001902 5F                      		pop	di
 14778 00001903 07                      		pop	es
 14779 00001904 C3                      		retn
 14780                                  
 14781                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14782                                  
 14783                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14784                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14785                                  ;
 14786                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14787                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14788                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14789                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14790                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14791                                  
 14792                                  checkromchange:	
 14793                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14794                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14795 00001905 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14796                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14797                                  					; fchanged
 14798 0000190A C3                      		retn
 14799                                  
 14800                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14801                                  
 14802                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14803                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14804                                  ;
 14805                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14806                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14807                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14808                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14809                                  
 14810                                  resetchanged:	
 14811                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14812                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14813 0000190B 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14814                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14815                                  					; ~fchanged
 14816 00001910 C3                      		retn
 14817                                  
 14818                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14819                                  
 14820                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14821                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14822                                  ;
 14823                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14824                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14825                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14826                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14827                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14828                                  
 14829                                  haschange:
 14830                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14831                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14832 00001911 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14833                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14834                                  					; fchangeline
 14835 00001916 C3                      		retn
 14836                                  
 14837                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14838                                  
 14839                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14840                                  
 14841                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14842                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14843                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14844                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14845                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14846                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14847                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14848                                  
 14849                                  ; set_volume_id
 14850                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14851                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14852                                  ;
 14853                                  ;   on entry:
 14854                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14855                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14856                                  ;
 14857                                  ;   on exit:
 14858                                  ;	carry clear:
 14859                                  ;	   successful call
 14860                                  ;	carry set
 14861                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14862                                  
 14863                                  set_volume_id:				
 14864 00001917 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14865 00001918 50                      		push	ax
 14866 00001919 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14867 0000191C 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14868 0000191E E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14869 00001921 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14870 00001923 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14871 00001926 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14872                                  setvret:				
 14873                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14874                                  		; cf = 0
 14875                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14876 00001929 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14877 0000192A 5A                      		pop	dx
 14878 0000192B C3                      		retn
 14879                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14880                                  
 14881                                  seterr:					
 14882 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14883 0000192D 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14884 0000192E C3                      		retn
 14885                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14886 0000192F 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14887                                  
 14888                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14889                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14890                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14891                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14892                                  
 14893                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14894                                  
 14895                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14896                                  
 14897                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14898                                  ;
 14899                                  ;   on entry:
 14900                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14901                                  ;
 14902                                  ;   on exit:
 14903                                  ;	carry clear
 14904                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14905                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14906                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14907                                  ;
 14908                                  ;	carry set:
 14909                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14910                                  
 14911                                  read_volume_id:
 14912 00001931 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14913 00001932 51                      		push	cx
 14914 00001933 53                      		push	bx
 14915 00001934 50                      		push	ax
 14916 00001935 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14917 00001936 57                      		push	di
 14918 00001937 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14919 00001938 07                      		pop	es
 14920 00001939 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14921 0000193C BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14922 0000193F B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14923 00001942 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14924 00001944 5F                      		pop	di
 14925 00001945 07                      		pop	es
 14926 00001946 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14927                                  					; # of fats
 14928 0000194A 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14929                                  					; sectors / fat
 14930 0000194E F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14931 00001950 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14932                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14933                                  					;
 14934                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14935                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14936 00001954 2EA3[2F19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14937                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14938                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14939 00001958 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14940                                  					; # root dir entries
 14941 0000195C B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14942 0000195E D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14943 00001960 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14944                                  next_sec:				
 14945 00001962 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14946 00001963 2EA1[2F19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14947                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14948                                  					; get sector #
 14949 00001967 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14950                                  					; sectors / track
 14951 0000196B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14952 0000196D F7F1                    		div	cx
 14953                                  
 14954                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14955                                  
 14956 0000196F 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14957                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14958 00001970 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14959 00001972 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14960 00001974 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14961                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14962 00001978 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14963 0000197A 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14964 0000197C E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14965                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14966 0000197F 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14967 00001981 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14968 00001984 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14969                                  fvid_loop:				
 14970 00001986 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14971 00001989 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14972 0000198B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14973 0000198E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14974 00001990 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14975 00001993 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14976                                  ent_loop:				
 14977 00001995 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14978 00001998 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14979 0000199A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14980 0000199B 2EFF06[2F19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14981                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14982                                  					; next sector
 14983 000019A0 E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14984                                  notfound:				
 14985 000019A2 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14986 000019A4 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14987                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14988                                  
 14989                                  found_vid:				
 14990 000019A6 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14991 000019A7 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14992 000019A9 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14993 000019AA 57                      		push	di
 14994 000019AB 1E                      		push	ds
 14995 000019AC 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14996 000019AD BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14997 000019B0 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14998                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14999 000019B3 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15000 000019B5 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 15001 000019B7 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15002 000019B8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15003 000019BA 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15004 000019BB 07                      		pop	es
 15005                                  fvid_ret:				
 15006 000019BC 58                      		pop	ax
 15007                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15008                                  		; cf = 0
 15009                                  		;clc
 15010                                  rvidret:				
 15011 000019BD 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15012 000019BE 59                      		pop	cx
 15013 000019BF 5A                      		pop	dx
 15014 000019C0 C3                      		retn
 15015                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15016                                  
 15017                                  no_vid:					
 15018 000019C1 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15019 000019C2 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15020                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15021                                  
 15022                                  readviderr:				
 15023 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15024 000019C5 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15025 000019C6 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15026                                  
 15027                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15028                                  
 15029                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15030                                  ;
 15031                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15032                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15033                                  
 15034                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 15035 000019C8 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15036 000019C9 56                      		push	si
 15037 000019CA 51                      		push	cx
 15038 000019CB BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15039                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 15040 000019CE 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15041                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15042 000019D1 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15043 000019D4 FC                      		cld
 15044 000019D5 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15045 000019D7 59                      		pop	cx
 15046 000019D8 5E                      		pop	si
 15047 000019D9 5F                      		pop	di
 15048 000019DA C3                      		retn
 15049                                  
 15050                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15051                                  
 15052                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15053                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15054                                  ;
 15055                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15056                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15057                                  
 15058                                  check_volume_id:	
 15059 000019DB 57                      		push	di
 15060 000019DC 51                      		push	cx
 15061 000019DD BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15062                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 15063 000019E0 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15064                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15065 000019E3 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15066 000019E6 FC                      		cld
 15067 000019E7 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15068 000019E9 59                      		pop	cx
 15069 000019EA 5F                      		pop	di
 15070 000019EB C3                      		retn
 15071                                  
 15072                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15073                                  
 15074                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15075                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15076                                  ;
 15077                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15078                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15079                                  ;
 15080                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15081                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15082                                  ;
 15083                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15084                                  
 15085                                  fat_check:		
 15086 000019EC 50                      		push	ax
 15087 000019ED 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15088 000019EF A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15089 000019F2 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15090                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15091 000019F6 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15092 000019F8 4E                      		dec	si
 15093                                  okret1:					
 15094 000019F9 58                      		pop	ax
 15095 000019FA C3                      		retn
 15096

 15114                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15115                                  
 15116                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15117 000019FB 00<rep 5h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15118                                  %endif
 15119                                  
 15120                                  ;align 16
 15121                                  
 15122                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15123                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15124                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15125                                  BCODEEND:
 15126                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15127                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15128                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15129                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15130                                  
 15131                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 15132

 15134                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 15135                                  ; ============================================================================
 15136                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 15145                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15146                                  
 15147                                  section .SYSINIT vstart=0
 15148                                  
 15149                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 15150                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 15151                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15152                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 31/12/2022))
 15153                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15154                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 15155                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15156                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 15157                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15158                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit5.s -l sysinit5.lst -o SYSINIT5.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 15159                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15160                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 15161                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15162                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 15163                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 15164                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15165                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 15166                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 15167                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 15168                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 15169                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 15170                                  
 15171                                  ; 21/10/2022
 15172                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15173                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 15174                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 15175                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 15176                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15177                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 15178                                  
 15179                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 15180                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 15181                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 15182                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 15183                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 15184                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 15185                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 15186                                  ;
 15187                                  ;
 15188                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 15189                                  ;
 15190                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 15191                                  ;
 15192                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 15193                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 15194                                  ;
 15195                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 15196                                  ;
 15197                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 15198                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 15199                                  ;
 15200                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 15201                                  ;
 15202                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 15203                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 15204                                  ;value.
 15205                                  ;
 15206                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 15207                                  ;
 15208                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 15209                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 15210                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 15211                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 15212                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 15213                                  ;
 15214                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 15215                                  ;
 15216                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 15217                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 15218                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 15219                                  ;
 15220                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 15221                                  ;
 15222                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 15223                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15224                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 15225                                  ;
 15226                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 15227                                  ;
 15228                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 15229                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15230                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 15231                                  ;
 15232                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 15233                                  ;
 15234                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 15235                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 15236                                  ;
 15237                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 15238                                  ;
 15239                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 15240                                  ;
 15241                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 15242                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 15243                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 15244                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 15245                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 15246                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 15247                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 15248                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 15249                                  ;memory.
 15250                                  ;NOTES:
 15251                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 15252                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 15253                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 15254                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 15255                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 15256                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 15257                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 15258                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 15259                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 15260                                  
 15261                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15262                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 15263                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15264                                  
 15265                                  ;include version.inc
 15266                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15267                                  
 15268                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 15269                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 15270                                  
 15271                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 15272                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 15273                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 15274                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 15275                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 15276                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 15277                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 15278                                  
 15279                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 15280                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15281                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 15282                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 15283                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15284                                  
 15285                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 15286                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15287                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 15288                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 15289                                  
 15290                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 15291                                  
 15292                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 15293                                  				; currently 0.
 15294                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 15295                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 15296                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 15297                                  
 15298                                  ;      if1
 15299                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 15300                                  ;      endif
 15301                                  
 15302                                         ;******************************
 15303                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 15304                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 15305                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 15306                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 15307                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 15308                                         ;******************************

 15315                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 15316                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 15317                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 15318                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 15319                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 15320                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 15321                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special

 15380                                                          ; word

 15382 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 15383 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 15384 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 15385                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 15386                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 15387                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 15388                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 15389                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 15390                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 15391                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 15392                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 15393 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 15394 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 15395 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 15396 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 15397 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 15398 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record

 15407                                  struc buffinfo
 15408 00000000 ????                    .buf_next:	resw 1	; Pointer to next buffer in list
 15409 00000002 ????                    .buf_prev:	resw 1	; Pointer to previous buffer in list
 15410 00000004 ??                      .buf_ID:	resb 1	; Drive of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 15411                                  			; SFT table index (bit 7 = 1)
 15412                                  			; = FFh if buffer free
 15413 00000005 ??                      .buf_flags:	resb 1	; Bit 7 = 1 if Remote file buffer
 15414                                  			;	= 0 if Local device buffer
 15415                                  			; Bit 6 = 1 if buffer dirty
 15416                                  			; Bit 5 = Reserved
 15417                                  			; Bit 4 = Search bit (bit 7 = 1)
 15418                                  			; Bit 3 = 1 if buffer is DATA
 15419                                  			; Bit 2 = 1 if buffer is DIR
 15420                                  			; Bit 1 = 1 if buffer is FAT
 15421                                  			; Bit 0 = Reserved
 15422 00000006 ????????                .buf_sector:	resd 1	; Sector number of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 15423                                  ; The next two items are often refed as a word (bit 7 = 0)
 15424 0000000A ??                      .buf_wrtcnt:	resb 1	; For FAT sectors, # times sector written out
 15425 0000000B ????                    .buf_wrtcntinc:	resw 1	; "   "     "   , # sectors between each write
 15426 0000000D ????????                .buf_DPB :	resd 1	; Pointer to drive parameters
 15427 00000011 ????                    .buf_fill:	resw 1	; How full buffer is (bit 7 = 1)
 15428 00000013 ??                      .buf_reserved:	resb 1	; make DWORD boundary for 386
 15429                                  .size:
 15430                                  endstruc
 15431                                  
 15432                                  %define buf_offset	dword [buf_sector]
 15433                                  			;For bit 7 = 1, this is the byte
 15434                                  			;offset of the start of the buffer in
 15435                                  			;the file pointed to by buf_ID.  Thus
 15436                                  			;the buffer starts at location
 15437                                  			;buf_offset in the file and contains
 15438                                  			;buf_fill bytes.
 15439

 15462                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15463                                  ;**	DPB - Drive Parameter Block
 15464                                  
 15465                                  ; 25/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.0, DPB.INC, 1991)
 15466                                  
 15467                                  ;	BUGBUG - this isn't authorative - it's my probably incomplete and
 15468                                  ;	possibly inaccurate deductions from code study... - jgl
 15469                                  ;
 15470                                  ;	The DPB is DOS's main structure for describing block devices.
 15471                                  ;	It contains info about the "Drive" intermingled with info about
 15472                                  ;	the FAT file system which is presumably on the drive.  I don't know
 15473                                  ;	how those fields are used if it's not the FAT file system - BUGBUG
 15474                                  ;
 15475                                  ;	The DPBs are statically allocated and chained off of DPBHead.
 15476                                  ;	Users scan this chain looking for a match on DPB_DRIVE.
 15477                                  ;	The DPBs are built at init time from info in the SYSDEV structure.
 15478                                  
 15479                                  ; 08/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 (MSDOS 3.3, DPB.INC, 24/07/1987)
 15480                                  
 15481                                  ; 12/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15482                                  
 15483                                  struc	DPB
 15484 00000000 ??                      .DRIVE:		resb 1		; Logical drive # assoc with DPB (A=0,B=1,...)
 15485 00000001 ??                      .UNIT:		resb 1		; Driver unit number of DPB
 15486 00000002 ????                    .SECTOR_SIZE:	resw 1		; Size of physical sector in bytes
 15487 00000004 ??                      .CLUSTER_MASK:	resb 1		; Sectors/cluster - 1
 15488 00000005 ??                      .CLUSTER_SHIFT:	resb 1		; Log2 of sectors/cluster
 15489 00000006 ????                    .FIRST_FAT:	resw 1		; Starting record of FATs
 15490 00000008 ??                      .FAT_COUNT:	resb 1		; Number of FATs for this drive
 15491 00000009 ????                    .ROOT_ENTRIES:	resw 1		; Number of directory entries
 15492 0000000B ????                    .FIRST_SECTOR:	resw 1		; First sector of first cluster
 15493 0000000D ????                    .MAX_CLUSTER:	resw 1		; Number of clusters on drive + 1
 15494                                  ;.FAT_SIZE:	resb 1  ; MSDOS 3.3
 15495 0000000F ????                    .FAT_SIZE:	resw 1		; Number of records occupied by FAT
 15496 00000011 ????                    .DIR_SECTOR:	resw 1		; Starting record of directory
 15497 00000013 ????????                .DRIVER_ADDR:	resd 1		; Pointer to driver
 15498 00000017 ??                      .MEDIA:		resb 1		; Media byte
 15499 00000018 ??                      .FIRST_ACCESS:	resb 1		; This is initialized to -1 to force a media
 15500                                  				; check the first time this DPB is used
 15501 00000019 ????????                .NEXT_DPB:	resd 1		; Pointer to next Drive parameter block
 15502 0000001D ????                    .NEXT_FREE:	resw 1		; Cluster # of last allocated cluster
 15503 0000001F ????                    .FREE_CNT:	resw 1		; Count of free clusters, -1 if unknown
 15504                                  .size:
 15505                                  endstruc
