 30311                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 30312                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 30313                                  	retn
 30314                                  
 30315                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30316                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 30317                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30318                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30319                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 30320                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30321                                  ; USES:     None
 30322                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30323                                  
 30324                                  unHideMCB:
 30325                                  	push	ax
 30326                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 30327                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30328                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30329                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30330                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30331                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30332                                  	pop	ax
 30333                                  	retn
 30334                                  
 30335                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30336                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30337                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30338                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30339                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30340                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30341                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30342                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30343                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30344                                  
 30345                                  findUMB:
 30346                                  	push	ax
 30347                                  	push	cx
 30348                                  	push	dx
 30349                                  
 30350                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30351                                  
 30352                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30353                                  
 30354                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30355                                  	mov	es,ax
 30356                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30357                                  
 30358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30359                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30360                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30361                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30362                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30363                                  
 30364                                  fu10:	
 30365                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30366                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30367                                  
 30368                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30369                                  	jnz	short fu20
 30370                                  
 30371                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30372                                  fu20:	
 30373                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30374                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30375                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30376                                  
 30377                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30378                                  	mov     ax,es
 30379                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30380                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30381                                  	inc     ax
 30382                                  	mov     es,ax
 30383                                  
 30384                                  	jmp	short fu10
 30385                                  fuE:	
 30386                                  	stc
 30387                                  fuX:
 30388                                  	pop	dx
 30389                                  	pop	cx
 30390                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30391                                  	retn
 30392                                  
 30393                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30394                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30395                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30396                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30397                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30398                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30399                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30400                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30401                                  
 30402                                  BigFree:
 30403                                  	push	bx
 30404                                  	push	cx
 30405                                  
 30406                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30407                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30408                                  
 30409                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30410                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30411                                  
 30412                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30413                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30414                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30415                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30416                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30417                                  
 30418                                  bf10:	
 30419                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30420                                  	jz	short bf30
 30421                                  
 30422                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30423                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30424                                  	jnz	short bf20
 30425                                  
 30426                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30427                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30428                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 30429                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30430                                  
 30431                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30432                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30433                                  	mov	cx,ax
 30434                                  
 30435                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30436                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30437                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30438                                  
 30439                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30440                                  	mov     ax,es
 30441                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30442                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30443                                  	inc     ax
 30444                                  	mov     es,ax
 30445                                  
 30446                                  	jmp	short bf10
 30447                                  
 30448                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30449                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30450                                  	or	bx,bx
 30451                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30452                                  bfE:	
 30453                                  	stc
 30454                                  bfX:
 30455                                  	pop	cx
 30456                                  	pop	bx
 30457                                  	retn
 30458                                  
 30459                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30460                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30461                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30462                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30463                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30464                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30465                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30466                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30467                                  
 30468                                  isSpecified:
 30469                                  	push	ax
 30470                                  
 30471                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30472                                  	mov	bl,al
 30473                                  
 30474                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30475                                  	;
 30476                                  	;push	ds
 30477                                  	;push	cs
 30478                                  	;pop	ds
 30479                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30480                                  	;pop	ds
 30481                                  	
 30482                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30483                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30484                                  
 30485                                  	pop	ax
 30486                                  	retn
 30487                                  
 30488                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30489                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30490                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30491                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30492                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30493                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30494                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30495                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30496                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30497                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30498                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30499                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30500                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30501                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30502                                  
 30503                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30504                                  
 30505                                  shrinkMCB:
 30506                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30507                                  	push	bx
 30508                                  	push	cx
 30509                                  	push	es
 30510                                  
 30511                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30512                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30513                                  
 30514                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30515                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30516                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30517                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30518                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30519                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30520                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30521                                  
 30522                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30523                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30524                                  
 30525                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30526                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30527                                  
 30528                                  	add	ax,bx
 30529                                  	inc	ax
 30530                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30531                                  
 30532                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30533                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30534                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30535                                  	; ax > 0
 30536                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30537                                  
 30538                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30539                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30540                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30541                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30542                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30543                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30544                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30545                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30546                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30547                                  
 30548                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30549                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30550                                  
 30551                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30552                                  	; cf=0
 30553                                  	;clc
 30554                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30555                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30556                                  smE:	
 30557                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30558                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30559                                  	;stc
 30560                                  smX:	
 30561                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 30562                                  	pop	es
 30563                                  	pop	cx
 30564                                  	pop	bx
 30565                                  	retn
 30566                                  
 30567                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30568                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30569                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30570                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30571                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30572                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30573                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30574                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30575                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30576                                  ;
 30577                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30578                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30579                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30580                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30581                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30582                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30583                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30584                                  ;       Endif
 30585                                  ;    Endif
 30586                                  ; Endif
 30587                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 30588                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 30589                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 30590                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 30591                                  ;    ENDIF
 30592                                  ; ENDIF
 30593                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30594                                  
 30595                                  _hideUMB_:
 30596                                  	push	bx
 30597                                  	push	dx
 30598                                  	push	es
 30599                                  
 30600                                  	mov	al,cl
 30601                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 30602                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30603                                  
 30604                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 30605                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 30606                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 30607                                  
 30608                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 30609                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 30610                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 30611                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 30612                                  
 30613                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 30614                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 30615                                  
 30616                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 30617                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 30618                                  
 30619                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 30620                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 30621                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 30622                                  hu_10:	
 30623                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 30624                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30625                                  
 30626                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 30627                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 30628                                  
 30629                                  	mov	dx,es
 30630                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 30631                                  
 30632                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 30633                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 30634                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 30635                                  
 30636                                  	xor	dx,dx
 30637                                  hu_30:	
 30638                                  	mov	al,cl
 30639                                  
 30640                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 30641                                  
 30642                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 30643                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 30644                                  
 30645                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 30646                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 30647                                  hu_X:	
 30648                                  	pop	es
 30649                                  	pop	dx
 30650                                  	pop	bx
 30651                                  	retn
 30652                                  
 30653                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30654                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 30655                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30656                                  ; Entry:  None
 30657                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 30658                                  ; Error:  None
 30659                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30660                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30661                                  
 30662                                  UnFreeze:
 30663                                  	push	ax
 30664                                  	push	es
 30665                                  
 30666                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30667                                  	jc	short ufX
 30668                                  
 30669                                  	mov	es,ax
 30670                                  
 30671                                  ; ------------------------------
 30672                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30673                                  ; ------------------------------
 30674                                  
 30675                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 30676                                  	jnz	short uf20
 30677                                  	call	unHideMCB
 30678                                  uf20:	
 30679                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30680                                  
 30681                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30682                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30683                                  
 30684                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30685                                  	mov     ax,es
 30686                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30687                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30688                                  	inc     ax
 30689                                  	mov     es,ax
 30690                                  
 30691                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30692                                  ufX:	
 30693                                  	pop	es
 30694                                  	pop	ax
 30695                                  	retn
 30696                                  
 30697                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30698                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30699                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30700                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30701                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30702                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30703                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30704                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30705                                  
 30706                                  isFrozMCB:
 30707                                  	;push	ax
 30708                                  
 30709                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30710                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30711                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30712                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30713                                  
 30714                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30715                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30716                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30717                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30718                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30719                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30720                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30721                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30722                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30723                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30724                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30725                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30726                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30727                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30728                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30729                                  ifmX:	
 30730                                  	;pop	ax
 30731                                  	retn
 30732                                  
 30733                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30734                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30735                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30736                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30737                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30738                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30739                                  ; USES:     None
 30740                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30741                                  
 30742                                  frezMCB:
 30743                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30744                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30745                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30746                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30747                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30748                                  	retn
 30749                                  
 30750                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30751                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30752                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30753                                  ; Entry:  None
 30754                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30755                                  ; Error:  None
 30756                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30757                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30758                                  
 30759                                  FreezeUM:
 30760                                  	push	ax
 30761                                  	push	cx
 30762                                  	push	dx
 30763                                  	push	es
 30764                                  
 30765                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30766                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30767                                  
 30768                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30769                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30770                                  
 30771                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30772                                  	mov	es,ax
 30773                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30774                                  
 30775                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30776                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30777                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30778                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30779                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30780                                  
 30781                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30782                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30783                                  
 30784                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30785                                  fum20:	
 30786                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30787                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30788                                  
 30789                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30790                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30791                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30792                                  
 30793                                  	call	frezMCB
 30794                                  fum30:	
 30795                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30796                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30797                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30798                                  
 30799                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30800                                  	mov     ax,es
 30801                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30802                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30803                                  	inc     ax
 30804                                  	mov     es,ax
 30805                                  	
 30806                                  	jmp	short fum10
 30807                                  
 30808                                  fumX:	pop	es
 30809                                  	pop	dx
 30810                                  	pop	cx
 30811                                  	pop	ax
 30812                                  	retn
 30813                                  
 30814                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30815                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 30816                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30817                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30818                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 30819                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30820                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 30821                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30822                                  
 30823                                  UmbTest:
 30824                                  	push	ax
 30825                                  	push	bx
 30826                                  	push	ds
 30827                                  	push	es
 30828                                  
 30829                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 30830                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 30831                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 30832                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 30833                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 30834                                  
 30835                                  	pop	es
 30836                                  	pop	ds
 30837                                  	pop	bx
 30838                                  	pop	ax
 30839                                  	retn
 30840                                  
 30841                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30842                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 30843                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30844                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30845                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30846                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30847                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30848                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30849                                  
 30850                                  WalkMem:
 30851                                  	push	ax ; ?
 30852                                  	push	bx ; ?
 30853                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 30854                                  		   	
 30855                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30856                                  	int	21h
 30857                                  
 30858                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 30859                                  	mov	es,ax
 30860                                  
 30861                                  ; ------------------------------
 30862                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 30863                                  ; ------------------------------
 30864                                  
 30865                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30866                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 30867                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 30868                                  
 30869                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 30870                                  
 30871                                  	mov     bx,es
 30872                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 30873                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30874                                  	inc     bx
 30875                                  	mov     es,bx
 30876                                  		
 30877                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 30878                                  um20:	
 30879                                  	mov	ax,es
 30880                                  
 30881                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 30882                                  
 30883                                  	pop	es ; ?
 30884                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 30885                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 30886                                  	retn
 30887                                  
 30888                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30889                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 30890                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30891                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30892                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30893                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30894                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30895                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30896                                  
 30897                                  hl_unlink:
 30898                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30899                                  
 30900                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 30901                                  	;
 30902                                  	;push	ds
 30903                                  	;push	cs
 30904                                  	;pop	ds
 30905                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 30906                                  	;pop	ds
 30907                                  
 30908                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 30909                                  
 30910                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30911                                  	int	21h
 30912                                  	retn
 30913                                  
 30914                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30915                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30916                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30917                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30918                                  
 30919                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 30920                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 30921                                  
 30922                                  ;   Modification log:
 30923                                  ;
 30924                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 30925                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 30926                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 30927                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 30928                                  
 30929                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 30930                                  
 30931                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30932                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 30933                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30934                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 30935                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 30936                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 30937                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30938                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 30939                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30940                                  
 30941                                  UnHideUMBs:
 30942                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 30943                                  
 30944                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30945                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 30946                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 30947                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 30948                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 30949                                  ;    every command execution.
 30950                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30951                                  
 30952                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 30953                                  	;
 30954                                  	;push	ds
 30955                                  	;push	cs
 30956                                  	;pop	ds
 30957                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 30958                                  	;pop	ds	
 30959                                  
 30960                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 30961                                  
 30962                                  	or	al,al
 30963                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 30964                                  
 30965                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 30966                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 30967                                  	retn			; that.
 30968                                  uhu10:	
 30969                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 30970                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 30971                                  
 30972                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 30973                                  	;
 30974                                  	;push	es
 30975                                  	;push	cs
 30976                                  	;pop	es
 30977                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 30978                                  	;pop	ds	
 30979                                  
 30980                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 30981                                  
 30982                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 30983                                  
 30984                                  	pop	ax
 30985                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30986                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 30987                                  	retn
 30988                                  
 30989                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30990                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 30991                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30992                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30993                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30994                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30995                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30996                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30997                                  
 30998                                  he_unlink:
 30999                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31000                                  
 31001                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31002                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31003                                  
 31004                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31005                                  	int	21h
 31006                                  	retn
 31007                                  
 31008                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31009                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31010                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31011                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31012                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31013                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31014                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31015                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31016                                  
 31017                                  FreeUMBs:
 31018                                  	push	ax
 31019                                  	push	es
 31020                                  
 31021                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31022                                  	jc	short fusX
 31023                                  
 31024                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31025                                  fus10:	
 31026                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31027                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31028                                  	call	freeMCB
 31029                                  fus20:	   
 31030                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31031                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31032                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31033                                  
 31034                                  	mov	ax,es
 31035                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31036                                  	inc	ax
 31037                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31038                                  
 31039                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31040                                  fusX:	
 31041                                  	pop	es
 31042                                  	pop	ax
 31043                                  	retn
 31044                                  
 31045                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31046                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31047                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31048                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31049                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31050                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31051                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31052                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31053                                  
 31054                                  isHideMCB:
 31055                                  	;push	ax
 31056                                  
 31057                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31058                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31059                                  
 31060                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31061                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31062                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31063                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31064                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31065                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31066                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31067                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31068                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31069                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31070                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31071                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31072                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31073                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31074                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31075                                  ihm_x:	
 31076                                  	;pop	ax
 31077                                  	retn
 31078                                  
 31079                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31080                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31081                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31082                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31083                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31084                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31085                                  ; USES:     AX
 31086                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31087                                  
 31088                                  freeMCB:
 31089                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31090                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31091                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31092                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31093                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31094                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31095                                  	retn
 31096                                  
 31097                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31098                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31099                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31100                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31101                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31102                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31103                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31104                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31105                                  
 31106                                  HeadUmb:
 31107                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31108                                  
 31109                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31110                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31111                                  	;push	es
 31112                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31113                                  
 31114                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31115                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31116                                  
 31117                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31118                                  	int	21h
 31119                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31120                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31121                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31122                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31123                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31124                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31125                                  
 31126                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31127                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31128                                  xhu_e:	
 31129                                  	;stc
 31130                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31131                                  xhu_x:	
 31132                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31133                                  	;pop	es	
 31134                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31135                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31136                                  	retn
 31137                                  
 31138                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31139                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31140                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31141                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31142                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31143                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31144                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31145                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31146                                  
 31147                                  linkumb:
 31148                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31149                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31150                                  
 31151                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?

 31153                                  
 31154                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31155                                  	mov	bx,1
 31156                                  	int	21h
 31157                                  lumbX:
 31158                                  	retn

 31166                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991)

 31170                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31171                                  ;
 31172                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31173                                  ;
 31174                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31175                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31176                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31177                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31178                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31179                                  ;
 31180                                  ;	Output : none
 31181                                  ;
 31182                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31183                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31184                                  ;
 31185                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31186                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31187                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31188                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31189                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31190                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31191                                  
 31192                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31193                                  InitDevLoad:
 31194                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31195                                  	; ds = cs
 31196 0000280C 803E[FB1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31197                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31198                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31199 00002811 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31200                                  
 31201                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31202                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31203                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31204                                  ;
 31205                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31206                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31207                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31208                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31209                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31210                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31211                                  ;
 31212                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31213                                  ;
 31214                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31215                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31216                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31217                                  ;	pushf
 31218                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31219                                  ;	popf
 31220                                  ;
 31221                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31222                                  ;
 31223                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31224                                  
 31225                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31226                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31227                                  InitForConv:
 31228                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31229                                  	; ds = cs
 31230 00002813 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31231                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31232 00002816 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31233 00002818 E84F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31234 0000281B E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31235 0000281E 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31236                                  					;  in low memory
 31237                                  InitForHi:
 31238                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31239                                  	; ds = cs
 31240                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31241                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31242                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31243 00002820 A1[F11E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31244 00002823 8B16[ED1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31245 00002827 0316[EF1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31246 0000282B EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31247                                  
 31248                                  InitForLo:
 31249                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31250                                  	; ds = cs
 31251                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31252 0000282D C606[FB1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31253                                  initforlo_x:
 31254                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31255                                  	; ds = cs
 31256                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31257                                  					;  we are loading low
 31258                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31259                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31260 00002832 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31261 00002835 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31262                                  idl1:
 31263 00002839 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31264                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31265                                  	; ds = cs
 31266                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31267                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31268                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31269                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31270 0000283C A3[E01E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31271 0000283F 8916[E21E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31272 00002843 C706[E41E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31273 00002849 A3[E61E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31274 0000284C C3                      	retn
 31275                                  
 31276                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31277                                  ;
 31278                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31279                                  ;
 31280                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31281                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31282                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31283                                  ;		   current UMB
 31284                                  ;
 31285                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31286                                  
 31287                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31288                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31289                                  	; ds = cs
 31290                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31291                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31292                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31293 0000284D A1[EF1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31294 00002850 0306[ED1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31295 00002854 2B06[F11E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31296                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31297                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31298                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31299                                  	;stc
 31300                                  	;retn
 31301                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31302 00002858 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31303 0000285B 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31304                                  spcinumb1:
 31305 0000285D 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31306                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31307                                  	; ds = cs
 31308 0000285E 3B06[DE1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31309                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31310                                  spcinumb2:
 31311 00002862 C3                      	retn
 31312                                  
 31313                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31314                                  ;
 31315                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31316                                  ;
 31317                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31318                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31319                                  ;
 31320                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31321                                  
 31322                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31323                                  ;
 31324                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31325                                  ;	push	ds
 31326                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31327                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31328                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31329                                  ;	pop	ds
 31330                                  ;

 31332                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax

 31337                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31338                                  ;
 31339                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31340                                  ;
 31341                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31342                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31343                                  ;		 the device.
 31344                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31345                                  ;
 31346                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31347                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31348                                  ;	UMB.
 31349                                  ;
 31350                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31351                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31352                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31353                                  ;
 31354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31355                                  
 31356                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31357                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31358                                  
 31359                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31360                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31361                                  	; ds = cs
 31362 00002863 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31363 00002866 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31364 00002869 CD21                    	int	21h
 31365                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31366                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31367                                  
 31368 0000286B 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31369 0000286D 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31370                                  
 31371 0000286F 4B                      	dec	bx
 31372                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31373                                  	; ds = cs
 31374 00002870 391E[DE1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31375                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31376 00002874 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31377 00002876 43                      	inc	bx
 31378                                  
 31379 00002877 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31380 0000287A CD21                    	int	21h
 31381 0000287C 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31382                                  
 31383                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31384                                  	;dec	ax
 31385                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31386                                  	;
 31387                                  PrepareMark:
 31388 0000287E 1E                      	push	ds
 31389 0000287F 48                      	dec	ax
 31390 00002880 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31391 00002882 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31392 00002888 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31393 0000288E 40                      	inc	ax
 31394 0000288F 1F                      	pop	ds
 31395                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31396                                  	; ds = cs
 31397                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31398                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31399                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31400 00002890 891E[EF1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31401 00002894 A3[ED1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31402 00002897 A3[F11E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31403                                  	;
 31404                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31405                                  	; cf=0
 31406                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31407 0000289A C3                      	retn
 31408                                  gufd_err:
 31409 0000289B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31410                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31411                                  	; ds = cs
 31412                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31413                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31414                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31415 0000289D A3[EF1E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31416 000028A0 A3[ED1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31417 000028A3 A3[F11E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31418 000028A6 F9                      	stc
 31419 000028A7 C3                      	retn
 31420                                  
 31421                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31422                                  ;
 31423                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31424                                  ;
 31425                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31426                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31427                                  ;
 31428                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31429                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31430                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31431                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31432                                  ;
 31433                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31434                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31435                                  ;
 31436                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31437                                  
 31438                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31439                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31440                                  
 31441                                  DevSetMark:
 31442 000028A8 06                      	push	es
 31443 000028A9 57                      	push	di
 31444 000028AA 1E                      	push	ds
 31445 000028AB 56                      	push	si
 31446 000028AC 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31447 000028AE 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31448 000028B4 40                      	inc	ax
 31449 000028B5 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31450                                  
 31451                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31452                                  
 31453 000028B9 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31454 000028BA 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31455                                  
 31456 000028BF 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31457 000028C1 FC                      	cld
 31458                                  dsm_again:
 31459 000028C2 AC                      	lodsb
 31460 000028C3 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31461 000028C5 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31462 000028C7 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31463 000028C9 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31464                                  isit_slash:
 31465 000028CB 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31466 000028CD 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31467 000028CF 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31468 000028D1 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31469                                  isit_null:
 31470 000028D3 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31471 000028D5 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31472 000028D7 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31473                                  
 31474 000028D9 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31475 000028DC B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31476                                  dsm_next_char:
 31477 000028DF AC                      	lodsb
 31478 000028E0 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31479 000028E2 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31480 000028E4 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31481 000028E6 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31482 000028E8 AA                      	stosb
 31483 000028E9 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31484                                  blankout:
 31485 000028EB E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31486 000028ED B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31487 000028EF F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31488                                  dsm_exit:
 31489 000028F1 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31490 000028F2 5E                      	pop	si
 31491 000028F3 1F                      	pop	ds
 31492 000028F4 5F                      	pop	di
 31493 000028F5 07                      	pop	es
 31494 000028F6 C3                      	retn
