 31496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31497                                  ;
 31498                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31499                                  ;
 31500                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31501                                  ;
 31502                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31503                                  ;
 31504                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31505                                  ;	in DevSize
 31506                                  ;
 31507                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31508                                  
 31509                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31510                                  SizeDevice:
 31511                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31512                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31513 000028F7 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31514 000028F8 06                      	push	es
 31515 000028F9 1F                      	pop	ds
 31516 000028FA 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31517 000028FC B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31518 000028FF CD21                    	int	21h
 31519 00002901 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31520                                  
 31521 00002903 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31522 00002905 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31523 00002908 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31524 0000290A 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31525 0000290C CD21                    	int	21h
 31526 0000290E 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31527 00002910 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31528 00002913 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31529 00002916 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31530 0000291A 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31531 0000291C 2EC706[DE1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31532                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31533 00002923 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31534                                  szdev1:
 31535 00002925 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31536 00002927 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31537 00002929 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31538 0000292B D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31539 0000292D 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31540                                  	;
 31541                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31542 0000292F 2E3B06[FC1E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31543                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31544                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31545 00002934 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 31546 00002936 2EA1[FC1E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31547                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31548 0000293A F8                      	clc
 31549                                  szdev2:
 31550 0000293B 2EA3[DE1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31551                                  
 31552                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31553                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31554                                  	; cf=0
 31555                                  	;clc
 31556                                  sd_close:
 31557 0000293F 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 31558                                  					;  carry flag
 31559 00002940 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31560 00002943 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31561 00002945 9D                      	popf
 31562                                  sd_err:
 31563                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31564                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31565 00002946 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 31566 00002947 C3                      	retn
 31567                                  
 31568                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31569                                  ;
 31570                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 31571                                  ;
 31572                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 31573                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 31574                                  ;
 31575                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 31576                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 31577                                  ;
 31578                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 31579                                  ;
 31580                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31581                                  
 31582                                  	; 01/11/2022
 31583                                  ExecDev:
 31584 00002948 2E8B1E[E01E]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]
 31585 0000294D 2E891E[F71E]            	mov	[cs:DevExecAddr],bx	; Load the parameter block
 31586                                  					;  block for exec with
 31587                                  					;  Load address
 31588 00002952 2E891E[F91E]            	mov	[cs:DevExecReloc],bx
 31589 00002957 8CCB                    	mov	bx,cs
 31590 00002959 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 31591 0000295B BB[F71E]                	mov	bx,DevExecAddr		;es:bx points to parameters
 31592 0000295E B003                    	mov	al,3	; (load program only)
 31593 00002960 B44B                    	mov	ah,EXEC ; 4Bh
 31594 00002962 CD21                    	int	21h			;load in the device driver
 31595                                   		; DOS - 2+ - LOAD OR EXECUTE (EXEC)
 31596                                  		; DS:DX -> ASCIZ filename
 31597                                  		; ES:BX -> parameter block
 31598                                  		; AL = subfunction 
 31599 00002964 C3                      	retn

 31601                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31602                                  ;
 31603                                  ; procedure : RetFromUM
 31604                                  ;
 31605                                  ;	Input : None
 31606                                  ;	Output : ConvLoad set if didn't previously call HideUMBs
 31607                                  ;		 ConvLoad clear if did.
 31608                                  ;
 31609                                  ;	Prepares memory for more devices after returning from loading one
 31610                                  ;	using the DOS 6 options (/L:... etc).
 31611                                  ;
 31612                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31877                                  ;
 31878                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31879                                  ;
 31880                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31881                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31882                                  ;
 31883                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31884                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31885                                  ;
 31886                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31887                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31888                                  ;
 31889                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31890                                  
 31891                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31892                                  
 31893                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31894                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31895                                  GetHexNum:
 31896 00002A2B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31897 00002A2D 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31898                                  ghn_next:
 31899 00002A2F 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31900 00002A32 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31901 00002A35 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31902 00002A37 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31903 00002A3A 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31904 00002A3C 50                      	push	ax
 31905 00002A3D 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31906 00002A3F E83706                  	call	delim
 31907 00002A42 58                      	pop	ax
 31908                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31909 00002A43 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31910 00002A46 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31911 00002A48 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31912                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31913                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31914 00002A4B 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31915                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31916                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31917                                  ghn_shift1:
 31918 00002A4D D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31919 00002A4F D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31920 00002A51 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31921 00002A53 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31922 00002A55 46                      	inc	si
 31923 00002A56 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31924                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31925 00002A58 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31926 00002A5B 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31927 00002A5E F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31928 00002A62 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31929                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31930                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31931                                  ghn_shift2:
 31932 00002A64 F8                      	clc
 31933 00002A65 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31934 00002A67 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31935 00002A69 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31936 00002A6B F8                      	clc
 31937 00002A6C C3                      	retn
 31938                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31939                                  ghn_err:
 31940                                  gnib_err:
 31941 00002A6D F9                      	stc
 31942                                  ghn_ret:
 31943                                  gnib_ret:
 31944 00002A6E C3                      	retn

 31950                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary

 32066                                  ;
 32067                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32068                                  ;
 32069                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32070                                  ;
 32071                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32072                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32073                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32074                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32075                                  ;				NC
 32076                                  ;			  else 
 32077                                  ;				CY
 32078                                  ;
 32079                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32080                                  ;
 32081                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32082                                  
 32083                                  umb_allocate:
 32084                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32085                                  	; ds = cs
 32086 00002ACC 50                      	push	ax
 32087 00002ACD B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32088 00002ACF BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32089                                  					;   possible
 32090                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32091 00002AD2 FF1E[F31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32092                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32093                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32094                                  					; the largest UMB
 32095 00002AD6 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32096 00002AD8 740D                    	jz	short ua_err
 32097                                  	
 32098 00002ADA B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32099                                  
 32100                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32101 00002ADC FF1E[F31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32102                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32103                                  
 32104 00002AE0 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32105 00002AE3 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32106                                  	;clc

 32108                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32109                                  	; cf=0
 32110                                  	;clc

 32112 00002AE5 58                      	pop	ax

 32118                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32119                                  ;
 32120                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32121                                  ;

 32123                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in

 32128                                  ;

 32130                                  ;
 32131                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32132                                  
 32133                                  umb_insert:
 32134 00002AEA 1E                      	push	ds
 32135                                  
 32136                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32137                                  	; ds = cs
 32138                                  
 32139                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32140 00002AEB 8E1E[0A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32141                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32142 00002AEF 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32143 00002AF3 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32144 00002AF5 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32145                                  ui_next:
 32146 00002AF7 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32147                                  					;    new block
 32148 00002AF9 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32149                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32150                                  					;    last
 32151 00002AFB 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32152 00002B01 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32153                                  					; N: get next block
 32154 00002B03 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32155                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32156 00002B05 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32157 00002B08 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32158                                  
 32159                                  ui_insert:
 32160 00002B0A 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32161 00002B0C 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32162                                  
 32163 00002B0D 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32164 00002B0F F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32165                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32166 00002B11 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32167                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32168 00002B16 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32169                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32170 00002B1C 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32171                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32172 00002B20 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32173                                  
 32174                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32175                                  
 32176 00002B26 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32177 00002B28 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32178 00002B2E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32179                                  					; mark as free
 32180 00002B35 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32181                                  					; start & end of new block
 32182 00002B38 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32183                                  
 32184                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32185                                  	
 32186 00002B3D 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32187 00002B3F 43                      	inc	bx
 32188 00002B40 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32189 00002B42 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32190                                  
 32191                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32192                                  					; this block
 32193 00002B43 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32194                                  	
 32195 00002B45 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32196 00002B4B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32197 00002B52 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32198 00002B56 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32199                                  
 32200 00002B5D EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32201                                  
 32202                                  ui_append:
 32203                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32204 00002B5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32205 00002B64 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32206                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32207                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32208                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32209 00002B6A 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32210

 32212 00002B72 40                      	inc	ax
 32213 00002B73 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32214                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32215 00002B75 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32216                                  
 32217 00002B77 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32218                                  
 32219 00002B79 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32220 00002B7F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned

 32223

 32227 00002B99 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32228                                  					; mark as free

 32232                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!

 32235                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022

 32238                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32239                                  
 32240                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32241                                  ;
 32242                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32243                                  ;
 32244                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32245                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32246                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32247                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32248                                  ;
 32249                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32250                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32251                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32252                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32253                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32254                                  ;
 32255                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32256                                  
 32257                                  umb_coalesce:
 32258                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32259                                  	; ds = cs
 32260 00002BA8 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32261                                  
 32262 00002BA9 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32263                                  
 32264                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32265                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32266 00002BAB 8E06[0A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32267 00002BAF 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32268                                  uc_nextfree:
 32269 00002BB4 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32270 00002BB6 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32271                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32272 00002BB8 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32273 00002BBD 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32274                                  					; N: get next arena
 32275 00002BBF E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32276 00002BC2 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32277 00002BC4 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32278                                  uc_again:
 32279 00002BC6 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32280 00002BC9 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32281                                  uc_check:
 32282 00002BCB 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32283 00002BD0 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32284                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32285 00002BD2 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32286 00002BD7 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32287                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32288 00002BD8 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32289 00002BDC 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32290 00002BDF 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32291 00002BE1 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32292                                  
 32293                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32294                                  ;uc_done:
 32295                                  	;retn
 32296                                  
 32297                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32298                                  ;
 32299                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32300                                  ;
 32301                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32302                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32303                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32304                                  ;
 32305                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32306                                  
 32307                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32308                                  get_next:
 32309 00002BE3 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32310 00002BE8 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32311                                  _get_next_:
 32312 00002BEA 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32313 00002BEC 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32314 00002BF0 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32315 00002BF1 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32316                                  	;clc
 32317                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32318                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32319                                  	; cf=0
 32320                                  	;clc
 32321 00002BF3 C3                      	retn
 32322                                  gn_err:
 32323 00002BF4 F9                      	stc
 32324                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32325                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32326 00002BF5 C3                      	retn

 32329                                  ;
 32330                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32331                                  ;
 32332                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32333                                  
 32334                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32335                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32336                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32337                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32338                                  	; ds = cs
 32339 00002BF6 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32340 00002BF9 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32341                                  
 32342                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32343                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32344                                  
 32345                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32346                                  	; ds = cs
 32347                                  
 32348 00002BFB CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32349 00002BFD B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32350 00002BFF D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32351                                  
 32352 00002C01 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32353 00002C03 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32354                                  
 32355 00002C05 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32356                                  
 32357 00002C07 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32358 00002C0A 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32359                                  	
 32360 00002C0C 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32361 00002C12 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32362                                  					
 32363 00002C19 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32364 00002C1D 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32365                                  
 32366                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32367                                  
 32368 00002C24 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32369 00002C26 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32370 00002C2C 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32371                                  					; mark as free 
 32372 00002C33 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32373 00002C34 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32374                                  
 32375                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32376                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32377 00002C39 8E06[0A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32378 00002C3D BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32379 00002C40 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32380                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32381                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32382                                  
 32383                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32384                                  
 32385 00002C43 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32386 00002C46 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32387 00002C49 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32388                                  ;scan_next
 32389                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32390                                  scannext:
 32391 00002C4B 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32392 00002C4F 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32393                                  	
 32394 00002C51 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32395 00002C53 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32396 00002C58 40                      	inc	ax
 32397 00002C59 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32398                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32399                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32400 00002C5B EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32401                                  got_last:
 32402 00002C5D 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32403 00002C63 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32404                                  	;clc
 32405                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32406                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32407                                  	; cf=0
 32408                                  	;clc
 32409 00002C69 C3                      	retn
 32410                                  
 32411                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32412                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32413                                  ;	;stc
 32414                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32415                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32416                                  ;	; cf=1
 32417                                  ;	;stc
 32418                                  ;	retn

 32420                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32421                                  ;
 32422                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32423                                  ;
 32424                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32425                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32426                                  ;
 32427                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32428                                  
 32429                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32430                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32431                                  	; ds = cs
 32432 00002C6A 833E[ED1E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32433                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32434 00002C6F 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32435 00002C71 06                      	push	es
 32436 00002C72 53                      	push	bx
 32437                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32438                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32439                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32440                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32441 00002C73 8B1E[F11E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32442 00002C77 2B1E[ED1E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32443 00002C7B 8E06[ED1E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32444                                  	
 32445 00002C7F B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32446 00002C82 CD21                    	int	21h
 32447                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32448                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32449                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32450 00002C84 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32451 00002C86 48                      	dec	ax
 32452 00002C87 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32453 00002C89 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32454 00002C90 5B                      	pop	bx
 32455 00002C91 07                      	pop	es
 32456                                  su_exit:
 32457 00002C92 C3                      	retn

 32461                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB

 32463                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 32464                                  ;
 32465                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32466                                  
 32467                                  UnlinkUMB:
 32468                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32469                                  	; ds = cs
 32470 00002C93 1E                      	push	ds
 32471 00002C94 06                      	push	es
 32472                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32473 00002C95 803E[091F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32474                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32475 00002C9A 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32476                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32477 00002C9C 8E06[0A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32478                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32479 00002CA0 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32480 00002CA5 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32481                                  ulu_next:
 32482 00002CAA E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32483 00002CAD 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32484 00002CAF 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32485 00002CB1 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32486 00002CB3 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32487 00002CB5 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32488                                  ulu_found:
 32489                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32490 00002CB7 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32491                                  ulu_x:
 32492 00002CBC 07                      	pop	es
 32493 00002CBD 1F                      	pop	ds
 32494 00002CBE C3                      	retn

 32496                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32497                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32498                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32499                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32500                                  
 32501                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32502                                  ;
 32503                                  ; Summary:
 32504                                  ;
 32505                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32506                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32507                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32508                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32509                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32510                                  ;
 32511                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32512                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32513                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32514                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32515                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32516                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32517                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32518                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32519                                  ;
 32520                                  ; Example:
 32521                                  ;
 32522                                  ;   [menu]
 32523                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32524                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32525                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32526                                  ;
 32527                                  ;   [network]
 32528                                  ;   include misc
 32529                                  ;   device=foo
 32530                                  ;
 32531                                  ;   [misc]
 32532                                  ;   device=bar
 32533                                  ;   include alternate
 32534                                  ;
 32535                                  ;   [alternate]
 32536                                  ;   device=tar
 32537                                  ;
 32538                                  ;
 32539                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32540                                  ;
 32541                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32542                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32543                                  ;
 32544                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32545                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32546                                  ;   following order:
 32547                                  ;
 32548                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32549                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32550                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32551                                  ;
 32552                                  
 32553                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32554                                  
 32555                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32556                                  
 32557                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32558                                  
 32559                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32560                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32561                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32562                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32563                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32564                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32565                                  
 32566                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32567                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32568                                  
 32569                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32570                                  
 32571                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32572                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32573                                  
 32574 00002CBF 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 32575

 32577                                  ;

 32625                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 32626                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)

 32628 00002CE6 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h

 32686                                  ; procedure : parseline

 32700                                  
 32701                                  nextswtch:

 32703                                  	je	short done_line
 32704                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32705                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32706                                  
 32707                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32708

 32711                                  	cmp	al,'/'

 32715

 32718                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32719                                  	jc	short swterr

 32722                                  	jc	short done_line
 32723                                  	jmp	short nextswtch

 32740                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32741                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32742                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32743                                  	; cf=0

 32757                                  ;
 32758                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32759                                  ;
 32760                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32761                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32762                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32763                                  ; error.
 32764                                  ;
 32765                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32766                                  
 32767                                  check_switch:

 32779

 32784 00002D2B B500                    	mov	ch,0

 32786 00002D30 F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32787                                  
 32788 00002D32 07                      	pop	es
 32789 00002D33 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32790                                  
 32791 00002D35 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32792 00002D38 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch

 32794 00002D3E 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32795 00002D40 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32796                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32797 00002D42 A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h

 33016                                  ;
 33017                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33018                                  ;
 33019                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33020                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33021                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33022                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33023                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33024                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33025                                  ;
 33026                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33027                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33028                                  ;
 33029                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33030                                  ;
 33031                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33032                                  
 33033                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33034                                  
 33035                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33036                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33037                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33038                                  	; ds = cs
 33039                                  	
 33040 00002DDD 06                      	push	es
 33041                                  
 33042 00002DDE 0E                      	push	cs
 33043 00002DDF 07                      	pop	es
 33044                                  
 33045 00002DE0 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33046 00002DE2 8A1E[DB35]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33047 00002DE6 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33048 00002DE9 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33049                                  
 33050 00002DEB C706[DE35]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33051                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33052                                  got_80:
 33053 00002DF1 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 33054 00002DF3 8BB7[8237]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 33055                                  
 33056                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 33057                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33058 00002DF7 BF[E135]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 33059 00002DFA B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 33060 00002DFD FC                      	cld
 33061                                  	;repe	movsb
 33062                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33063 00002DFE F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 33064                                  
 33065 00002E00 07                      	pop	es
 33066                                  
 33067                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33068 00002E01 F606[0337]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 33069                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 33070 00002E06 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 33071

 33073                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 33074 00002E0B A3[EE35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 33075                                  
 33076                                  see_heads:
 33077                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33078 00002E0E F606[0337]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 33079                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 33080 00002E13 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 33081                                  
 33082 00002E15 A1[FE36]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 33083                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 33084 00002E18 A3[F035]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 33085                                  
 33086                                  heads_not_altered:
 33087                                  
 33088                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 33089                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 33090                                  
 33091                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 33092                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33093                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 33094                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33095 00002E1B B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 33096 00002E1E A2[E335]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 33097                                  
 33098 00002E21 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 33099                                  
 33100                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 33101                                  
 33102                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 33103                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33104 00002E23 8A3E[EB35]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 33105                                  
 33106                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33107                                  	; ax = 2
 33108 00002E27 3906[F035]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 33109                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 33110 00002E2B 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 33111                                  
 33112 00002E2D 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 33113                                  
 33114                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 33115                                  
 33116 00002E2F 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 33117                                  
 33118                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33119                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33120                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33121                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33122                                  
 33123                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33124                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33125                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 33126                                  
 33127 00002E31 833E[EE35]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 33128 00002E36 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 33129 00002E38 833E[DE35]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 33130 00002E3D 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 33131                                  
 33132                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 33133                                  
 33134 00002E3F EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33135                                  
 33136                                  ;	check for 320K
 33137                                  
 33138                                  not_144m:
 33139 00002E41 833E[DE35]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33140 00002E46 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33141 00002E48 833E[EE35]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33142 00002E4D 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33143

 33145 00002E51 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 33146                                  
 33147                                  only_one_head:
 33148                                  
 33149                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 33150                                  
 33151 00002E53 803E[DB35]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33152 00002E58 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33153                                  
 33154                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 33155                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 33156                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 33157

 33159 00002E5C 833E[EE35]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8

 33162                                  
 33163 00002E63 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 33164                                  
 33165                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 33166                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 33167                                  
 33168                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 33169                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33170                                  	; ax = 2
 33171 00002E65 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1

 33173                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 33174                                  
 33175                                  got_correct_mediad:
 33176 00002E69 881E[EB35]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 33177                                  
 33178                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 33179                                  
 33180 00002E6D A1[DE35]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 33181 00002E70 F726[F035]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 33182 00002E74 F726[EE35]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 33183 00002E78 A3[E935]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 33184 00002E7B F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 33185                                  
 33186 00002E7C C3                      	retn

 33562 00002FE3 803E[D003]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH

 33564 00002FE8 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 33565 00002FEA 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 33566 00002FEC 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 33567 00002FEE 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 33568 00002FF0 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 33569 00002FF2 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 33570 00002FF7 AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 33571 00002FF8 FE06[BF2C]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 33572                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 33573                                  					; inserted
 33574 00002FFC EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 33575                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 33576                                  
 33577 00002FFE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 33578 00003000 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 33579 00003002 EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 33580                                  
 33581                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 33582                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33583                                  	; ds = cs
 33584 00003004 803E[BF2C]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 33585                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 33586 00003009 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 33587 0000300B 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 33588 00003010 AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 33589                                  					; M051 - End
 33590                                  org1_brdg:
 33591 00003011 C606[BF2C]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 33592                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 33593                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 33594 00003016 E976FE                  	jmp	org1
 33595                                  
 33596                                  at_quote:
 33597 00003019 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33598                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 33599 0000301E 7407                    	je	short up_level
 33600                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 33601 00003020 C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 33602 00003025 EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 33603                                  
 33604                                  up_level:
 33605                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 33606 00003027 FE06[CC03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 33607 0000302B EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 33608                                  
 33609                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33610                                  ;
 33611                                  ; procedure : get2
 33612                                  ;
 33613                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33614                                  
 33615                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33616                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 33617                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33618                                  get2:
 33619 0000302D E304                    	jcxz	noget
 33620                                  	;
 33621                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33622                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 33623                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33624 0000302F 26                      	es	
 33625 00003030 AC                      	lodsb
 33626                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 33627                                  	;inc	si
 33628                                  	;
 33629 00003031 49                      	dec	cx
 33630 00003032 C3                      	retn
 33631                                  noget:
 33632 00003033 59                      	pop	cx
 33633                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33634                                  	; ds = cs
 33635                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 33636                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 33637 00003034 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 33638 00003038 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 33639 0000303C 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 33640                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 33641 0000303E 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 33642                                  
 33643                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33644                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 33645                                  ;;	retn
 33646                                  ;;else
 33647                                  ;
 33648                                  ;;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 33649                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 33650                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 33651                                  ;
 33652                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 33653                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 33654                                  ;;endif
 33655                                  
 33656                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33657 00003042 C3                      	retn
 33658                                  
 33659                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33660                                  ;
 33661                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33662                                  ;
 33663                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33664                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33665                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33666                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33667                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33668                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33669                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33670                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33671                                  ;
 33672                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33673                                  
 33674                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33675                                  
 33676                                  skip_comment:
 33677 00003043 E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33678                                  
 33679                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33680                                  	; ds = cs	
 33681                                  
 33682 00003045 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33683                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33684 0000304A 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33685                                  
 33686 0000304C 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33687                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33688 00003051 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33689                                  
 33690 00003053 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33691                                  	
 33692 00003056 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33693                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33694 0000305A 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33695                                  
 33696 0000305C 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33697                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33698 00003061 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33699                                  
 33700 00003063 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33701                                  	
 33702 00003067 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33703                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33704 0000306B 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33705                                  skip_cmmt:
 33706 0000306D E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33707 0000306F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33708 00003072 46                      	inc	si
 33709 00003073 49                      	dec	cx
 33710 00003074 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33711 00003076 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33712                                  no_commt:
 33713 00003078 C3                      	retn
 33714                                  
 33715                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33716                                  %if 0
 33717                                  
 33718                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33719                                  
 33720                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33721                                  ;
 33722                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33723                                  ;
 33724                                  ;   INPUT
 33725                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33726                                  ;
 33727                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33728                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33729                                  ;
 33730                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33731                                  ;       All
 33732                                  ;
 33733                                  ;   HISTORY
 33734                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33735                                  ;
 33736                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33737                                  
 33738                                  kbd_read:
 33739                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33740                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33741                                  
 33742                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33743                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33744                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33745                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33746                                  kbd_loop:
 33747                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33748                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33749                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33750                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33751                                          int     16h             ;
 33752                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33753                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33754                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33755                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33756                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33757                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33758                                  
 33759                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33760                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33761                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33762                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33763                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33764                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33765                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33766                                          int     16h             ;
 33767                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33768                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33769                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33770                                          inc     bx
 33771                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33772                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33773                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33774                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33775                                          int     16h             ;
 33776                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33777                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33778                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33779                                  
 33780                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33781                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33782                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33783                                  	
 33784                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33785                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33786                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33787                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33788                                          call    print
 33789                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33790                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33791                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33792                                  kbd_notf5:
 33793                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33794                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33795                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33796                                  
 33797                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33798                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33799                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33800                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33801                                          call    print           ;
 33802                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33803                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33804                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33805                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33806                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33807                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33808                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33809                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33810                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33811                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33812                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33813                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33814                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33815                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33816                                          retn			;
 33817                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33818                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33819                                          retn			;
 33820                                  
 33821                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33822                                  ;
 33823                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33824                                  ;
 33825                                  ;   INPUT
 33826                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33827                                  ;
 33828                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33829                                  ;       None
 33830                                  ;
 33831                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33832                                  ;       None
 33833                                  ;
 33834                                  ;   HISTORY
 33835                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33836                                  ;
 33837                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33838                                  
 33839                                  set_numlock:
 33840                                          push    ax
 33841                                          push    ds
 33842                                          sub     ax,ax
 33843                                          mov     ds,ax
 33844                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33845                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33846                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33847                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33848                                          jmp     short set_done
 33849                                  not_off:
 33850                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33851                                          stc
 33852                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33853                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33854                                  set_done:
 33855                                          pop     ds
 33856                                          pop     ax
 33857                                          retn
 33858                                  
 33859                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33860                                  
 33861                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33862                                  ;
 33863                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33864                                  ;
 33865                                  ;   INPUT
 33866                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33867                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33868                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33869                                  ;
 33870                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33871                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33872                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33873                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33874                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33875                                  ;
 33876                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33877                                  ;       All
 33878                                  ;
 33879                                  ;   NOTES
 33880                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33881                                  ;
 33882                                  ;   HISTORY
 33883                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33884                                  ;
 33885                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33886                                  
 33887                                  menu_check:
 33888                                  
 33889                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
