 33890                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33891                                  
 33892                                          push    cx              ;
 33893                                          push    si              ;
 33894                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33895                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33896                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33897                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33898                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33899                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33900                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33901                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33902                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33903                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33904                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33905                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33906                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33907                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33908                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33909                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33910                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33911                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33912                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33913                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33914                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33915                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33916                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33917                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33918                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33919                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33920                                          call    get_char        ;
 33921                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33922                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33923                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 33924                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33925                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33926                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 33927                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 33928                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 33929                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 33930                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33931                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 33932                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33933                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 33934                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 33935                                          pop     si              ;
 33936                                          pop     cx              ;
 33937                                  
 33938                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 33939                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 33940                                  
 33941                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33942                                          jnz	short menu_search
 33943                                  ;
 33944                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 33945                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 33946                                  ;
 33947                                          call    kbd_read
 33948                                          jnc	short menu_search
 33949                                          jmp	menu_abort
 33950                                  
 33951                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 33952                                  
 33953                                  menu_search:
 33954                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 33955                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 33956                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 33957                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 33958                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 33959                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 33960                                  
 33961                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 33962                                  
 33963                                  menu_color:
 33964                                          push    cx              ;
 33965                                          push    dx              ;
 33966                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 33967                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 33968                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 33969                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 33970                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 33971                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33972                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 33973                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 33974                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 33975                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 33976                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 33977                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 33978                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 33979                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 33980                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33981                                  check_color:                    ;
 33982                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 33983                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 33984                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 33985                                  set_color:
 33986                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 33987                                          pop     dx              ;
 33988                                          pop     cx              ;
 33989                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 33990                                  
 33991                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 33992                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 33993                                  
 33994                                  menu_found:
 33995                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 33996                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 33997                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 33998                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 33999                                  
 34000                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34001                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34002                                  
 34003                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34004                                  
 34005                                  menu_process:
 34006                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34007                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34008                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34009                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34010                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34011                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34012                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34013                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34014                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34015                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34016                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34017                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34018                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34019                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34020                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 34021                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34022                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34023                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34024                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34025                                          stc                     ;
 34026                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34027                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34028                                  menu_numlock:
 34029                                          call    set_numlock
 34030                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34031                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 34032                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 34033                                  
 34034                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 34035                                  
 34036                                  menu_default:
 34037                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 34038                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 34039                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 34040                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 34041                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 34042                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 34043                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 34044                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 34045                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 34046                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 34047                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 34048                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 34049                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 34050                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 34051                                  timeout_skip:
 34052                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34053                                  
 34054                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 34055                                  
 34056                                  menu_item:
 34057                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 34058                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 34059                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 34060                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34061                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 34062                                          stc                     ;
 34063                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 34064                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 34065                                  
 34066                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 34067                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 34068                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 34069                                  
 34070                                  menu_itemfound:
 34071                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 34072                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 34073                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 34074                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 34075                                  
 34076                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 34077                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 34078                                  ;   description...
 34079                                  
 34080                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 34081                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 34082                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 34083                                          call    skip_token      ;
 34084                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34085                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 34086                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34087                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 34088                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 34089                                  
 34090                                  menu_nextitem:
 34091                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34092                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 34093                                  
 34094                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 34095                                  
 34096                                  menu_getdefault:
 34097                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 34098                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 34099                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 34100                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 34101                                  menu_valid:
 34102                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 34103                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 34104                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 34105                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 34106                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 34107                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 34108                                  menu_chkdefault:
 34109                                          push    bx              ;
 34110                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34111                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34112                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 34113                                          push    ds              ;
 34114                                          push    es              ;
 34115                                          pop     ds              ;
 34116                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 34117                                          pop     ds              ;
 34118                                          pop     bx              ;
 34119                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 34120                                          inc     bx              ;
 34121                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 34122                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 34123                                  menu_nodefault:
 34124                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 34125                                  menu_setdefault:
 34126                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 34127                                  
 34128                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 34129                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 34130                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 34131                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 34132                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 34133                                  ;   with no timeout)
 34134                                  
 34135                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 34136                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 34137                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 34138                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 34139                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 34140                                  
 34141                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 34142                                  
 34143                                  menu_display:
 34144                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 34145                                          int     10h             ;
 34146                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 34147                                          int     10h             ;
 34148                                          push    es              ;
 34149                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 34150                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 34151                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 34152                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 34153                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 34154                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 34155                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 34156                                          int     10h             ;
 34157                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 34158                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 34159                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 34160                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 34161                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 34162                                  	dec     dl              ;
 34163                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 34164                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 34165                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 34166                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 34167                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 34168                                  menu_clear:
 34169                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 34170                                          pop     es              ;
 34171                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 34172                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 34173                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 34174                                  
 34175                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34176                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 34177                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34178                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 34179                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 34180                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 34181                                          int     10h             ;
 34182                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 34183                                          call    print           ;
 34184                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 34185                                          int     10h             ;
 34186                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 34187                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 34188                                  
 34189                                  menu_nostatus:
 34190                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 34191                                  menu_disploop:
 34192                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 34193                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 34194                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 34195                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 34196                                  
 34197                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 34198                                  
 34199                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 34200                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34201                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 34202                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34203                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 34204                                          int     10h             ;
 34205                                  
 34206                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 34207                                          call    print           ;
 34208                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 34209                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 34210                                          call    print           ;
 34211                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 34212                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34213                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 34214                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 34215                                  
 34216                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 34217                                  
 34218                                  menu_autoselect:
 34219                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 34220                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 34221                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 34222                                  menu_abort:
 34223                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 34224                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 34225                                  
 34226                                  normal_boot:
 34227                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 34228                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 34229                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 34230                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34231                                          jmp     menu_search
 34232                                  
 34233                                  not_topmenu:
 34234                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34235                                          jne	short not_submenu
 34236                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34237                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34238                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 34239                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34240                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 34241                                          jmp     menu_found
 34242                                  
 34243                                  not_submenu:
 34244                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 34245                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34246                                  
 34247                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 34248                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 34249                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 34250                                  
 34251                                  no_selection:
 34252                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 34253                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 34254                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34255                                          push    ds              ;
 34256                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 34257                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34258                                  
 34259                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 34260                                  ;
 34261                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 34262                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 34263                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 34264                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 34265                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 34266                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 34267                                  ;
 34268                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 34269                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 34270                                  
 34271                                  copyblock_loop:
 34272                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 34273                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 34274                                          pop     bx              ;
 34275                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34276                                  
 34277                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 34278                                  
 34279                                  copyblock_begin:
 34280                                          push    ax              ;
 34281                                          push    cx              ;
 34282                                          push    si              ;
 34283                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 34284                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34285                                          push    ds              ;
 34286                                          push    cs              ;
 34287                                          pop     ds              ;
 34288                                          call    comp_names      ;
 34289                                          pop     ds              ;
 34290                                          pop     di              ;
 34291                                          pop     si              ;
 34292                                          pop     cx              ;
 34293                                          pop     ax              ;
 34294                                          je	short copyblock_check
 34295                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 34296                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 34297                                          push    di              ;
 34298                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 34299                                          push    ds              ;
 34300                                          push    es              ;
 34301                                          pop     ds              ;
 34302                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 34303                                          pop     ds              ;
 34304                                          pop     di              ;
 34305                                  copyblock_check:
 34306                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34307                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 34308                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34309                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 34310                                  
 34311                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 34312                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 34313                                          call    get_char        ;
 34314                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34315                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34316                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34317                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 34318                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 34319                                  ;
 34320                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 34321                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 34322                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 34323                                  ;
 34324                                  move_config:
 34325                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 34326                                          push    cx              ;
 34327                                  ;
 34328                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 34329                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 34330                                  ;
 34331                                   	;mov	cx,7
 34332                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 34333                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 34334                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 34335                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 34336                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 34337                                  copy_boot: 
 34338                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 34339                                          cs
 34340                                  	lodsb
 34341                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 34342                                          inc     di              ;
 34343                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 34344                                  
 34345                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 34346                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 34347                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 34348                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 34349                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 34350                                          push    cs              ;
 34351                                          pop     es              ;
 34352                                          mov     si,szCommon
 34353                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 34354                                          call    any_delim       ;
 34355                                          je	short l2	;
 34356                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34357                                          inc     si              ;
 34358                                          inc     di              ;
 34359                                          loop    l1              ;
 34360                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 34361                                          pop     es              ;
 34362                                  
 34363                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 34364                                  
 34365                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34366                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34367                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34368                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 34369                                  
 34370                                          push    cx              ;
 34371                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 34372                                          pop     cx              ;
 34373                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 34374                                          pop     ds              ;
 34375                                  
 34376                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 34377                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 34378                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 34379                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 34380                                  ;   is empty.
 34381                                  
 34382                                          push    es              ;
 34383                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34384                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 34385                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 34386                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34387                                          pop     es
 34388                                  
 34389                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 34390                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 34391                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 34392                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 34393                                  
 34394                                  menu_done:
 34395                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 34396                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 34397                                          push    es              ;
 34398                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 34399                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34400                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 34401                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 34402                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 34403                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 34404                                          pop     es              ;
 34405                                  menu_exit:
 34406                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 34407                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 34408                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 34409                                          retn
 34410                                  
 34411                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34412                                  ;
 34413                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34414                                  ;
 34415                                  ;   INPUT
 34416                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 34417                                  ;
 34418                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34419                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 34420                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 34421                                  ;
 34422                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34423                                  ;       None
 34424                                  ;
 34425                                  ;   NOTES
 34426                                  ;       None
 34427                                  ;
 34428                                  ;   HISTORY
 34429                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34430                                  ;
 34431                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34432                                  
 34433                                  copy_envvar:
 34434                                          push    cx              ;
 34435                                          push    si              ;
 34436                                          push    ds              ;
 34437                                          push    es              ;
 34438                                          push    es              ;
 34439                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 34440                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 34441                                  
 34442                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 34443                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 34444                                  ;   config.sys line)
 34445                                  ;
 34446                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 34447                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 34448                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 34449                                  
 34450                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 34451                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 34452                                          lodsb                   ;
 34453                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 34454                                          stc                     ;
 34455                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 34456                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 34457                                          stc                     ;
 34458                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34459                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 34460                                          stc                     ;
 34461                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34462                                          inc     cx              ;
 34463                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 34464                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 34465                                          mov     al,0            ;
 34466                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 34467                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 34468                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 34469                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 34470                                  copy_varsrch:
 34471                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 34472                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 34473                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 34474                                          push    cx              ;
 34475                                          push    si              ;
 34476                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 34477                                          pop     si              ;
 34478                                          pop     cx              ;
 34479                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 34480                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 34481                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 34482                                  
 34483                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 34484                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 34485                                  
 34486                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34487                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 34488                                          push    si              ;
 34489                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34490                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 34491                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 34492                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 34493                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 34494                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 34495                                  
 34496                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 34497                                  	es	; 26h
 34498                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 34499                                  
 34500                                  	pop     si
 34501                                  copy_envprep:
 34502                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 34503                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 34504                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 34505                                          je	short copy_envdel
 34506                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34507                                  
 34508                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 34509                                          push    cx              ;
 34510                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34511                                          repne   scasb           ;
 34512                                          pop     cx              ;
 34513                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 34514                                  
 34515                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 34516                                          lodsb                   ;
 34517                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 34518                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34519                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 34520                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34521                                          stosb                   ;
 34522                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34523                                  
 34524                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 34525                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 34526                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 34527                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 34528                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 34529                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34530                                  
 34531                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 34532                                          pop     es              ;
 34533                                          pop     ds              ;
 34534                                          pop     si              ;
 34535                                          pop     cx              ;
 34536                                  
 34537                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34538                                          retn
 34539                                  
 34540                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34541                                  ;
 34542                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 34543                                  ;
 34544                                  ;   INPUT
 34545                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34546                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34547                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 34548                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 34549                                  ;
 34550                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34551                                  ;       Same as above
 34552                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 34553                                  ;
 34554                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34555                                  ;       All
 34556                                  ;
 34557                                  ;   NOTES
 34558                                  ;       None
 34559                                  ;
 34560                                  ;   HISTORY
 34561                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34562                                  ;
 34563                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34564                                  
 34565                                  copy_block:
 34566                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 34567                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 34568                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34569                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 34570                                          je	short copy_done ;
 34571                                  
 34572                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 34573                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 34574                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 34575                                  
 34576                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 34577                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 34578                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 34579                                  
 34580                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 34581                                          push    di              ;
 34582                                  
 34583                                          mov     di,szMenu
 34584                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 34585                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34586                                  
 34587                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34588                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 34589                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34590                                  
 34591                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 34592                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34593                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 34594                                          pop     di              ;
 34595                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 34596                                          push    cx              ;
 34597                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 34598                                          push    si              ;
 34599                                          dec     dx              ;
 34600                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 34601                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 34602                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 34603                                          pop     si              ;
 34604                                          pop     cx              ;
 34605                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 34606                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34607                                  
 34608                                  copy_skip:
 34609                                          pop     di
 34610                                  copy_error:
 34611                                          clc                     ;
 34612                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 34613                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34614                                  
 34615                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 34616                                  
 34617                                  copy_line:
 34618                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34619                                          inc     di              ;
 34620                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 34621                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 34622                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 34623                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 34624                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 34625                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 34626                                          inc     di              ;
 34627                                          inc     di              ;
 34628                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 34629                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 34630                                          call    get_char        ;
 34631                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 34632                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34633                                          inc     di              ;
 34634                                  copy_next:
 34635                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 34636                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 34637                                  
 34638                                  copy_nextline:
 34639                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34640                                          jmp     short copy_block
 34641                                  
 34642                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34643                                  ;copy_done:
 34644                                          ;retn
 34645                                  
 34646                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34647                                  ;
 34648                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 34649                                  ;
 34650                                  ;   INPUT
 34651                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 34652                                  ;
 34653                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34654                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 34655                                  ;
 34656                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34657                                  ;       DX
 34658                                  ;
 34659                                  ;   NOTES
 34660                                  ;       None
 34661                                  ;
 34662                                  ;   HISTORY
 34663                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34664                                  ;
 34665                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34666                                  
 34667                                  get_linenum:
 34668                                          push    ax              ;
 34669                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 34670                                          push    cx              ;
 34671                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 34672                                          push    si              ;
 34673                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34674                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 34675                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 34676                                          call    skip_line       ;
 34677                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 34678                                          inc     bx              ;
 34679                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 34680                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 34681                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 34682                                          pop     si              ;
 34683                                          pop     cx              ;
 34684                                          pop     ax              ;
 34685                                          retn
 34686                                  
 34687                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34688                                  ;
 34689                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 34690                                  ;
 34691                                  ;   INPUT
 34692                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 34693                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 34694                                  ;
 34695                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34696                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 34697                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 34698                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 34699                                  ;
 34700                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34701                                  ;       None
 34702                                  ;
 34703                                  ;   NOTES
 34704                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 34705                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 34706                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 34707                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 34708                                  ;
 34709                                  ;   HISTORY
 34710                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34711                                  ;
 34712                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34713                                  
 34714                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 34715                                          push    ax              ;
 34716                                          push    cx              ;
 34717                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34718                                          push    si              ;
 34719                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34720                                          push    ds              ;
 34721                                          push    es              ;
 34722                                          pop     ds              ;
 34723                                          call    find_block      ;
 34724                                          mov     di,si           ;
 34725                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 34726                                          pop     ds              ;
 34727                                          pop     si              ;
 34728                                          pop     cx              ;
 34729                                          pop     ax              ;
 34730                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 34731                                          retn			;
 34732                                  
 34733                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34734                                  ;
 34735                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 34736                                  ;
 34737                                  ;   INPUT
 34738                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 34739                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 34740                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 34741                                  ;
 34742                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34743                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 34744                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34745                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34746                                  ;
 34747                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34748                                  ;       AX
 34749                                  ;
 34750                                  ;   NOTES
 34751                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 34752                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 34753                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 34754                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 34755                                  ;
 34756                                  ;   HISTORY
 34757                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34758                                  ;
 34759                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34760                                  
 34761                                  find_block:
 34762                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 34763                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 34764                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 34765                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 34766                                          je	short check_line ; no
 34767                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 34768                                          jne	short next_line	;
 34769                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34770                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 34771                                  check_line:
 34772                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34773                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 34774                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 34775                                  next_line:
 34776                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 34777                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 34778                                  ;find_exit:
 34779                                  ;	retn
 34780                                  
 34781                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34782                                  ;
 34783                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 34784                                  ;
 34785                                  ;   INPUT
 34786                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 34787                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34788                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34789                                  ;
 34790                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34791                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 34792                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34793                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34794                                  ;
 34795                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34796                                  ;       AX
 34797                                  ;
 34798                                  ;   NOTES
 34799                                  ;       None
 34800                                  ;
 34801                                  ;   HISTORY
 34802                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34803                                  ;
 34804                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34805                                  
 34806                                  comp_names:
 34807                                          push    di              ;
 34808                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 34809                                          call    get_char        ;
 34810                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 34811                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 34812                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 34813                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 34814                                          inc     di              ;
 34815                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 34816                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 34817                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 34818                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 34819                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 34820                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 34821                                          pop     di              ;
 34822                                          retn			;
 34823                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 34824                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 34825                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 34826                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 34827                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 34828                                  
 34829                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34830                                  
 34831                                  comp_names_safe:
 34832                                          push    ax
 34833                                          push    cx
 34834                                          push	si
 34835                                          push    ds
 34836                                          push    cs
 34837                                          pop     ds
 34838                                          call    comp_names
 34839                                          pop     ds
 34840                                  	pop	si
 34841                                          pop     cx
 34842                                          pop     ax
 34843                                          retn
 34844                                  
 34845                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34846                                  ;
 34847                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 34848                                  ;
 34849                                  ;   INPUT
 34850                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 34851                                  ;
 34852                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34853                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 34854                                  ;
 34855                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34856                                  ;       None
 34857                                  ;
 34858                                  ;   NOTES
 34859                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 34860                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 34861                                  ;
 34862                                  ;   HISTORY
 34863                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34864                                  ;
 34865                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34866                                  
 34867                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 34868                                          push    ax              ;
 34869                                          push    bx              ;
 34870                                          push    cx              ;
 34871                                          push    dx              ;
 34872                                          push    si              ;
 34873                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34874                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 34875                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 34876                                          push    dx              ; save it
 34877                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34878                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34879                                          add     dh,3            ;
 34880                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 34881                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 34882                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34883                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 34884                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 34885                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 34886                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34887                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 34888                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 34889                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34890                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 34891                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 34892                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34893                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34894                                  print_other:                    ;
 34895                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 34896                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34897                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 34898                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 34899                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 34900                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 34901                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 34902                                          int     10h             ;
 34903                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34904                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34905                                          int     10h             ;
 34906                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 34907                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 34908                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 34909                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34910                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34911                                          int     10h             ;
 34912                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 34913                                          mov	ax,0920h
 34914                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 34915                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34916                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34917                                          int     10h             ;
 34918                                          push    es              ;
 34919                                  print_loop:                     ;
