 34920                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 34921                                          inc     di              ;
 34922                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 34923                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 34924                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 34925                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 34926                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 34927                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 34928                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 34929                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 34930                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 34931                                          int     10h             ;
 34932                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34933                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 34934                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 34935                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34936                                          int     10h             ;
 34937                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 34938                                  print_done:                     ;
 34939                                          pop     es              ;
 34940                                          pop     dx              ;
 34941                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34942                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 34943                                          pop     si              ;
 34944                                          pop     dx              ;
 34945                                          pop     cx              ;
 34946                                          pop     bx              ;
 34947                                          pop     ax              ;
 34948                                          retn			;
 34949                                  
 34950                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34951                                  ;
 34952                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 34953                                  ;
 34954                                  ;   INPUT
 34955                                  ;       None
 34956                                  ;
 34957                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34958                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 34959                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 34960                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 34961                                  ;
 34962                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34963                                  ;       None
 34964                                  ;
 34965                                  ;   NOTES
 34966                                  ;       None
 34967                                  ;
 34968                                  ;   HISTORY
 34969                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34970                                  ;
 34971                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34972                                  
 34973                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 34974                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 34975                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34976                                          call    disp_num        ;
 34977                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 34978                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34979                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 34980                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 34981                                          int     21h             ;
 34982                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 34983                                  check_time:
 34984                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 34985                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 34986                                          jae	short show_time	;
 34987                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 34988                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 34989                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 34990                                  show_time:
 34991                                          push    bx              ;
 34992                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 34993                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34994                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34995                                          int     10h             ;
 34996                                          push    dx              ;
 34997                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 34998                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34999                                          int     10h             ;
 35000                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35001                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35002                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35003                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35004                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 35005                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35006                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 35007                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35008                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35009                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35010                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 35011                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35012                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35013                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35014                                          pop     dx
 35015                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35016                                          int     10h             ;
 35017                                          pop     bx              ;
 35018                                  input_key:
 35019                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35020                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35021                                          int     21h             ;
 35022                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 35023                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35024                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35025                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35026                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35027                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 35028                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35029                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 35030                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 35031                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35032                                  got_time:
 35033                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35034                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 35035                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35036                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 35037                                  got_key:
 35038                                          push    ax              ;
 35039                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35040                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35041                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35042                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35043                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35044                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35045                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35046                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35047                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35048                                          pop     bx   		;
 35049                                  
 35050                                  timeout_disabled:
 35051                                          pop     ax              ;
 35052                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35053                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35054                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35055                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35056                                  
 35057                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35058                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 35059                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35060                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35061                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35062                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35063                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35064                                          jmp     short print1
 35065                                  not_up:
 35066                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35067                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35068                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35069                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35070                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35071                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35072                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35073                                  print1: 
 35074                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35075                                  print2: 
 35076                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35077                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35078                                  to_input_key:
 35079                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35080                                  not_down:
 35081                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35082                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35083                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35084                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35085                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35086                                          call    show_status     ;
 35087                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35088                                  not_f8:
 35089                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35090                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35091                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35092                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35093                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35094                                  
 35095                                  normal_key:
 35096                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35097                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35098                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35099                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35100                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35101                                          retn			;
 35102                                  not_backspace:
 35103                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35104                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35105                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35106                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35107                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35108                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35109                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35110                                          jmp	short print2
 35111                                  
 35112                                  select_done:
 35113                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35114                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35115                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35116                                  
 35117                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35118                                  
 35119                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35120                                  
 35121                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35122                                  ;
 35123                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35124                                  ;
 35125                                  ;   INPUT
 35126                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35127                                  ;
 35128                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35129                                  ;       None
 35130                                  ;
 35131                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35132                                  ;       None
 35133                                  ;
 35134                                  ;   NOTES
 35135                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35136                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35137                                  ;
 35138                                  ;   HISTORY
 35139                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35140                                  ;
 35141                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35142                                  
 35143                                  disp_input:
 35144                                          push    ax
 35145                                          cmp     al,' '
 35146                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35147                                          mov     al,' '
 35148                                  disp_ok:
 35149                                          mov     dl,al
 35150                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35151                                          int     21h
 35152                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35153                                          call    print
 35154                                          pop     ax
 35155                                          retn
 35156                                  
 35157                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35158                                  
 35159                                  disp_num:
 35160                                          push    bx
 35161                                          add     al,'0'
 35162                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35163                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35164                                          mov     cx,1
 35165                                          int     10h
 35166                                          pop     bx
 35167                                          retn
 35168                                  
 35169                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35170                                  ;
 35171                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35172                                  ;
 35173                                  ;   INPUT
 35174                                  ;       None
 35175                                  ;
 35176                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35177                                  ;       None
 35178                                  ;
 35179                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35180                                  ;       None
 35181                                  ;
 35182                                  ;   NOTES
 35183                                  ;       None
 35184                                  ;
 35185                                  ;   HISTORY
 35186                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35187                                  ;
 35188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35189                                  
 35190                                  show_status:
 35191                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35192                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35193                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35194                                          int     10h             ;
 35195                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35196                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35197                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35198                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35199                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35200                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35201                                          int     10h             ;
 35202                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35203                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35204                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35205                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35206                                  show_onoff: 
 35207                                          int     10h
 35208                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35209                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35210                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35211                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35212                                  
 35213                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35214                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35215                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35216                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35217                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35218                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35219                                          int     10h             ;
 35220                                  show_done:                      ;
 35221                                          pop     dx              ;
 35222                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35223                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35224                                          pop     bx              ;
 35225                                          retn			;
 35226                                  
 35227                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35228                                  
 35229                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35230                                  ;
 35231                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35232                                  ;
 35233                                  ;   INPUT
 35234                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35235                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35236                                  ;
 35237                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35238                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35239                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35240                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35241                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35242                                  ;
 35243                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35244                                  ;       AX
 35245                                  ;
 35246                                  ;   NOTES
 35247                                  ;       None
 35248                                  ;
 35249                                  ;   HISTORY
 35250                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35251                                  ;
 35252                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35253                                  
 35254                                  skip_token:
 35255                                          call    get_char
 35256                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35257                                          call    any_delim
 35258                                          jne	short skip_token
 35259                                  skip_check_eol:
 35260                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35261                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35262                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35263                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35264                                          clc
 35265                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35266                                  	retn
 35267                                  skip_token_eol:
 35268                                          stc
 35269                                  skip_token_done:
 35270                                          retn
 35271                                  
 35272                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35273                                  ;
 35274                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35275                                  ;
 35276                                  ;   INPUT
 35277                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35278                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35279                                  ;
 35280                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35281                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35282                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35283                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35284                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35285                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35286                                  ;
 35287                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35288                                  ;       AX
 35289                                  ;
 35290                                  ;   NOTES
 35291                                  ;       None
 35292                                  ;
 35293                                  ;   HISTORY
 35294                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35295                                  ;
 35296                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35297                                  
 35298                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35299                                          call    get_char        ;
 35300                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35301                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35302                                          call    delim           ;
 35303                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35304                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35305                                  
 35306                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35307                                  ;
 35308                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35309                                  ;
 35310                                  ;   INPUT
 35311                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35312                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35313                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35314                                  ;
 35315                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35316                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35317                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35318                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35319                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35320                                  ;
 35321                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35322                                  ;       AX
 35323                                  ;
 35324                                  ;   NOTES
 35325                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35326                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35327                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35328                                  ;
 35329                                  ;   HISTORY
 35330                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35331                                  ;
 35332                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35333                                  
 35334                                  skip_opt_line:
 35335                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35336                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35337                                       
 35338                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35339                                  
 35340                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35341                                  ;
 35342                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35343                                  ;
 35344                                  ;   INPUT
 35345                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35346                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35347                                  ;
 35348                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35349                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35350                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35351                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35352                                  ;
 35353                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35354                                  ;       AX
 35355                                  ;
 35356                                  ;   NOTES
 35357                                  ;       None
 35358                                  ;
 35359                                  ;   HISTORY
 35360                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35361                                  ;
 35362                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35363                                  
 35364                                  skip_line:
 35365                                          call    get_char
 35366                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35367                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35368                                          jne	short skip_line
 35369                                  skip_line_done:
 35370                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35371                                          retn
 35372                                  
 35373                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35374                                  ;
 35375                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35376                                  ;
 35377                                  ;   INPUT
 35378                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35379                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35380                                  ;
 35381                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35382                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35383                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35384                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35385                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35386                                  ;
 35387                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35388                                  ;       AX
 35389                                  ;
 35390                                  ;   NOTES
 35391                                  ;       None
 35392                                  ;
 35393                                  ;   HISTORY
 35394                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35395                                  ;
 35396                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35397                                  
 35398                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35399                                  
 35400                                  get_number:
 35401                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35402                                  num_loop:
 35403                                          call    get_char        ;
 35404                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35405                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35406                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35407                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35408                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35409                                          push    ax              ;
 35410                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35411                                          push    dx              ;
 35412                                          mul     bx              ;
 35413                                          pop     dx              ;
 35414                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35415                                          pop     ax              ;
 35416                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35417                                          cbw                     ;
 35418                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35419                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35420                                  
 35421                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35422                                  ;num_done:
 35423                                          ;retn
 35424                                  
 35425                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35426                                  ;
 35427                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35428                                  ;
 35429                                  ;   INPUT
 35430                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35431                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35432                                  ;
 35433                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35434                                  ;       AL == next character
 35435                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35436                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35437                                  ;
 35438                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35439                                  ;       AX
 35440                                  ;
 35441                                  ;   NOTES
 35442                                  ;       None
 35443                                  ;
 35444                                  ;   HISTORY
 35445                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35446                                  ;
 35447                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35448                                  
 35449                                  get_char:
 35450                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35451                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35452                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35453                                  	es	
 35454                                  	lodsb
 35455                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35456                                          retn			;
 35457                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35458                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35459                                  nearby_ret:
 35460                                          retn
 35461                                  
 35462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35463                                  ;
 35464                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35465                                  ;
 35466                                  ;   INPUT
 35467                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35468                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35469                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35470                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35471                                  ;
 35472                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35473                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35474                                  ;
 35475                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35476                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35477                                  ;
 35478                                  ;   NOTES
 35479                                  ;       None
 35480                                  ;
 35481                                  ;   HISTORY
 35482                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35483                                  ;
 35484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35485                                  
 35486                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35487                                  query_user:
 35488                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35489                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35490                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35491                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35492                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35493                                  qu_1:
 35494                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35495                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35496                                          push    ax                      ;
 35497                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35498                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35499                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35500                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35501                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35502                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35503                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35504                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35505                                  query_all:
 35506                                  
 35507                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35508                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35509                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35510                                  
 35511                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35512                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35513                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35514                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35515                                  
 35516                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35517                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35518                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35519                                  find_match:                             ;
 35520                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35521                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35522                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35523                                          inc     di                      ;
 35524                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35525                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35526                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35527                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35528                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35529                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35530                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35531                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35532                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35533                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35534                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35535                                          inc     di                      ;
 35536                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35537                                          int     21h                     ;
 35538                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35539                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35540                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35541                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35542                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35543                                  cmd_notset:
 35544                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35545                                  line_print:                             ;
 35546                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35547                                          es
 35548                                  	lodsb
 35549                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35550                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35551                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35552                                  non_null:                               ;
 35553                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35554                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35555                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35556                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35557                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35558                                  non_space:                              ;
 35559                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35560                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35561                                          int     21h                     ;
 35562                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35563                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35564                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35565                                  
 35566                                  generic_prompt:
 35567                                          call    print                   ;
 35568                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35569                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35570                                          int     16h                     ;
 35571                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35572                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35573                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35574                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35575                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35576                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35577                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35578                                  not_func:
 35579                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35580                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35581                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35582                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35583                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35584                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35585                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35586                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35587                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35588                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35589                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35590                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35591                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35592                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35593                                  
 35594                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35595                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35596                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35597                                  	clc
 35598                                  do_cmd:
 35599                                  	pop     ax			;
 35600                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35601                                  	; cf=0
 35602                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35603                                  	retn
 35604                                  
 35605                                  skip_cmd:
 35606                                  	pop     ax			;
 35607                                  skip_all:
 35608                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35609                                  	stc
 35610                                  	retn
 35611                                  
 35612                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35613                                  ;
 35614                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35615                                  ;
 35616                                  ;   INPUT
 35617                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35618                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35619                                  ;
 35620                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35621                                  ;       None
 35622                                  ;
 35623                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35624                                  ;       None
 35625                                  ;
 35626                                  ;   NOTES
 35627                                  ;       None
 35628                                  ;
 35629                                  ;   HISTORY
 35630                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35631                                  ;
 35632                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35633                                  
 35634                                  print_error:
 35635                                          push    ax
 35636                                          push    bx
 35637                                          push    cx
 35638                                          push    dx
 35639                                          push    ds
 35640                                          push    cs
 35641                                          pop     ds
 35642                                          pushf
 35643                                          call    get_linenum
 35644                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35645                                          call    error_line
 35646                                          popf
 35647                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35648                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35649                                          call    print
 35650                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35651                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35652                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35653                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35654                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35655                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35656                                  pe_1:     
 35657                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35658                                          call    print
 35659                                  pe_ret: 
 35660                                  	pop     ds
 35661                                          pop     dx
 35662                                          pop     cx
 35663                                          pop     bx
 35664                                          pop     ax
 35665                                  	retn
 35666                                  
 35667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35668                                  
 35669                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35670                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35671                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35672                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35673                                  
 35674                                  disable_autoexec:
 35675                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35676                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35677                                  
 35678                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35679                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35680                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35681                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35682                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35683                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35684                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35685                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35686                                  dae_1:
 35687                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35688                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35689                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35690                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35691                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35692                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35693                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35694                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35695                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35696                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35697                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35698                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35699                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35700                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35701                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35702                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35703                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35704                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35705                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35706                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35707                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35708                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35709                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35710                                          retn
 35711                                  
 35712                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35713                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35714                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35715                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35716                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35717                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35718                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 35719                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35720                                  
 35721                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35722                                  
 35723                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35724                                  
 35725                                  
 35726                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35727                                  
 35728                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35729                                  ;
 35730                                  ; procedure : delim
 35731                                  ;
 35732                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35733                                  
 35734                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35735                                  ;
 35736                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35737                                  ;
 35738                                  ;any_delim:
 35739                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35740                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35741                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35742                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35743                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35744                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35745                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35746                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35747                                  ;
 35748                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35749                                  
 35750                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35751                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35752                                  delim:
 35753 00003079 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35754 0000307B 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35755                                  
 35756 0000307D 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35757 0000307F 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35758                                  
 35759                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35760 00003081 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35761 00003083 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35762 00003085 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35763 00003087 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35764 00003089 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35765 0000308B 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35766 0000308D 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35767 0000308F 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35768 00003091 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35769                                  
 35770                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35771                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35772                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35773                                  ;	clc
 35774                                  ;;endif
 35775                                  
 35776                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35777                                  delim_ret:
 35778 00003093 C3                      	retn
 35779                                  
 35780                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35781                                  ;
 35782                                  ; procedure : newline
 35783                                  ;
 35784                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 35785                                  ;
 35786                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35787                                  
 35788                                  newline:
 35789 00003094 E898F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 35790 00003097 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret
 35791 00003099 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 35792 0000309B 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35793 0000309D E88FF6                  	call	getchr
 35794                                  nl_ret:
 35795 000030A0 C3                      	retn
 35796                                  
 35797                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35798                                  ; 
 35799                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35800                                  ;
 35801                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35802                                  
 35803                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35804                                  mapcase:
 35805 000030A1 51                      	push	cx
 35806 000030A2 56                      	push	si
 35807 000030A3 1E                      	push	ds
 35808                                  
 35809 000030A4 06                      	push	es
 35810 000030A5 1F                      	pop	ds
 35811                                  
 35812                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35813                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35814                                  ;
 35815                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35816                                  ;;else
 35817                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35818                                  ;;endif
 35819                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35820 000030A6 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35821                                  
 35822                                  convloop:
 35823 000030A8 AC                      	lodsb
 35824 000030A9 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35825 000030AB 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35826 000030AD 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35827 000030AF 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35828 000030B1 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35829 000030B3 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35830                                  noconv:
 35831                                  
 35832                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35833                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35834                                  ;;
 35835                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35836                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35837                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35838                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35839                                  ;;
 35840                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35841                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35842                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35843                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35844                                  ;check_eol:
 35845                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35846                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35847                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35848                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35849                                  ;;endif
 35850                                  	
 35851                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35852 000030B6 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35853                                  convdone:
 35854 000030B8 1F                      	pop	ds
 35855 000030B9 5E                      	pop	si
 35856 000030BA 59                      	pop	cx
 35857 000030BB C3                      	retn
 35858                                  
 35859                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35860                                  ;
 35861                                  ; procedure : round
 35862                                  ;
 35863                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35864                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35865                                  ;
 35866                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35867                                  
 35868                                  round:
 35869 000030BC 50                      	push	ax
 35870 000030BD 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35871                                  
 35872 000030C1 E8F5DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35873                                  
 35874 000030C4 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35875 000030C9 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0

 35944                                  	;cmp	al,9
 35945                                  	;ja	short notdig

 35956                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35957                                  ;
 35958                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35959                                  ;
 35960                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35961                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35962                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35963                                  ;
 35964                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35965                                  
 35966                                  getnum:
 35967 00003133 53                      	push	bx
 35968 00003134 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35969                                  b2:
 35970 00003136 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35971 00003139 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35972                                  
 35973 0000313B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35974 0000313C 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35975                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35976                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35977 0000313D B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35978 0000313F F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35979 00003141 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35980 00003142 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35981 00003144 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35982 00003147 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35983                                  
 35984 00003149 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35985                                  
 35986 0000314A E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35987 0000314D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35988 0000314F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35989 00003151 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35990 00003153 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35991 00003155 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35992 00003157 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35993 00003159 7417                    	je	short b15
 35994 0000315B 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35995 00003160 7410                    	je	short b15
 35996 00003162 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35997                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35998                                  	;nop
 35999                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36000                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36001                                  	;nop
 36002                                  	;nop
 36003 00003164 740C                    	je	short b15
 36004 00003166 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36005 00003168 7408                    	je	short b15
 36006 0000316A 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36007 0000316C 7404                    	je	short b15
 36008 0000316E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36009 00003170 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36010                                  b15:
 36011 00003172 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36012 00003177 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36013                                  b1:
 36014 0000317C 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36015 0000317E 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36016 00003180 5B                      	pop	bx
 36017 00003181 C3                      	retn
 36018                                  badnum:
 36019                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36020                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36021 00003182 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36022                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36023 00003184 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36024 00003188 5B                      	pop	bx
 36025 00003189 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36026 0000318A C3                      	retn

 36030                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36031                                  
 36032                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36033                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36034                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36035                                  ;	si = 0
 36036                                  ;	ax = country id
 36037                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36038                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36039                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36040                                  ;
 36041                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36042                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36043                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36044                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.

 36047 0000318B 57                      	push	di

 36080 000031BE 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail

 36094 000031D0 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36095                                  
 36096 000031D2 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?

 36098 000031D7 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36099 000031DA 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36100                                  
 36101                                  setdoscntry_next:

 36106                                  
 36107 000031E2 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36108                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36109 000031E5 F9                      	stc
 36110 000031E6 C3                      	retn
 36111

 36262                                  getcountrydestination:
 36263                                  
 36264                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36265                                  ;input: al - data id
 36266                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36267                                  ;on return:

 36269                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36270                                  
 36271 000032B9 51                      	push	cx
 36272                                  	;add	di,74
 36273 000032BA 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36274                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36275 000032BD 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36276 000032C0 47                      	inc	di
 36277 000032C1 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36278

 36280 000032C2 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al

 36287

 36291                                  getcntrydest_loop:

 36295

 36302
