 36311                                  
 36312                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36313                                  
 36314                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36315                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36316                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36317                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36318                                  ;	 be moved.
 36319                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36320                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36321                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36322                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36323                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36324                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36325                                  
 36326 000032E7 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36327 000032E8 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36328 000032EB F9                      	stc
 36329 000032EC CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36330 000032EE 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36331 000032EF 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36332                                  
 36333 000032F1 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36334 000032F3 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36335 000032F5 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36336 000032F7 F9                      	stc
 36337 000032F8 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36338                                  ricb_exit:
 36339 000032FA C3                      	retn
 36340                                  
 36341                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36342                                  
 36343                                  set_country_path:
 36344                                  
 36345                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36346                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36347                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36348                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36349                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36350                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36351                                  
 36352 000032FB 56                      	push	si
 36353                                  
 36354 000032FC 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36355 000032FD 06                      	push	es
 36356 000032FE 1F                      	pop	ds
 36357 000032FF 07                      	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 36358                                  
 36359 00003300 E82E00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 36360 00003303 7206                    	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 36361                                  
 36362 00003305 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36363 00003307 46                      	inc	si
 36364 00003308 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 36365 00003309 EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 36366                                  
 36367                                  scp_default_drv:
 36368 0000330B B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36369 0000330D CD21                    	int	21h
 36370 0000330F 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36371                                  
 36372                                  scp_setdrv:
 36373 00003311 2EA2[7C34]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36374 00003315 BF[7F34]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36375 00003318 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36376 0000331A 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36377 0000331C 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36378                                  
 36379 0000331E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36380 00003320 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36381                                  
 36382 00003322 EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 36383                                  
 36384                                  scp_root_dir:
 36385 00003324 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 36386                                  scp_path:
 36387 00003325 E81F00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 36388                                  
 36389 00003328 BF[7C34]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36390                                  scpath_exit:
 36391                                  
 36392 0000332B 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36393 0000332C 06                      	push	es
 36394 0000332D 1F                      	pop	ds
 36395 0000332E 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36396                                  
 36397 0000332F 5E                      	pop	si
 36398 00003330 C3                      	retn
 36399                                  
 36400                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36401                                  
 36402                                  chk_drive_letter:
 36403                                  
 36404                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 36405                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36406                                  ;carry set if not.
 36407                                  
 36408 00003331 50                      	push	ax
 36409 00003332 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 36410                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 36411 00003335 720E                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 36412 00003337 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 36413 0000333A 7708                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 36414 0000333C 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 36415 00003340 7502                    	jne	short cdletter_no
 36416                                  
 36417 00003342 EB01                    	jmp	short cdletter_exit
 36418                                  
 36419                                  cdletter_no:
 36420 00003344 F9                      	stc
 36421                                  cdletter_exit:
 36422 00003345 58                      	pop	ax
 36423 00003346 C3                      	retn
 36424                                  
 36425                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36426                                  
 36427                                  move_asciiz:
 36428                                  
 36429                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 36430                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 36431                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 36432                                  
 36433                                  masciiz_loop:
 36434 00003347 A4                      	movsb
 36435 00003348 807CFF00                	cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 36436 0000334C 75F9                    	jne	short masciiz_loop
 36437 0000334E C3                      	retn
 36438                                  
 36439                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36440                                  
 36441                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 36442                                  ;
 36443                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 36444                                  
 36445                                  badfil:
 36446 0000334F 0E                      	push	cs
 36447 00003350 07                      	pop	es
 36448                                  
 36449 00003351 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 36450                                  badload:
 36451 00003353 BA[0738]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 36452 00003356 BB[C437]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 36453                                  prnerr:
 36454 00003359 0E                      	push	cs
 36455 0000335A 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 36456 0000335B E81D00                  	call	print
 36457                                  prn1:
 36458 0000335E 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 36459 00003361 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 36460 00003363 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 36461 00003365 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 36462 00003367 CD21                    	int	21h
 36463 00003369 46                      	inc	si
 36464 0000336A EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 36465                                  prn2:
 36466 0000336C 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 36467 0000336E E80A00                  	call	print
 36468                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36469                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 36470 00003371 803E[D103]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1 ; suppress line number when handling command.com
 36471                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 36472 00003376 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 36473                                  	
 36474                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36475                                  	;call	error_line
 36476 00003378 E9CBF3                  	jmp	error_line
 36477                                  ;prnexit:
 36478                                  	;retn
 36479                                  
 36480                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36481                                  
 36482                                  print:
 36483 0000337B B409                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT ; 9
 36484 0000337D CD21                    	int	21h
 36485                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 36486 0000337F C3                      	retn
 36487

 36527 00003395 F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h

 36529
